They_PRP ax_NN *_SYM e_LS England_NNP and_CC Scotland_NNP ,_, and_CC Ireland_NNP ._.
England_NNP and_CC Scotland_NNP form_VBP the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN these_DT Islands_NNPS ._.
Ireland_NNP is_VBZ the_DT next_JJ in_IN size_NN ._.
The_DT little_JJ neighbouring_JJ islands_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP so_RB small_JJ upon_IN the_DT Map_NN as_IN to_TO be_VB mere_JJ dots_NNS ,_, are_VBP chiefly_RB little_JJ bits_NNS of_IN Scotland_NNP ,_, --_: broken_VBN off_RP ,_, I_PRP dare_VBP say_VB ,_, in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN a_DT great_JJ length_NN of_IN time_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT power_NN of_IN the_DT restless_JJ water_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT old_JJ days_NNS ,_, a_DT long_RB ,_, long_RB while_IN ago_RB ,_, before_IN Our_PRP$ Saviour_NNP was_VBD born_VBN on_IN earth_NN and_CC lay_VBD asleep_RB in_IN a_DT manger_NN ,_, these_DT Islands_NNPS were_VBD in_IN the_DT same_JJ place_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT stormy_JJ sea_NN roared_VBD round_JJ them_PRP ,_, just_RB as_IN it_PRP roars_VBZ now_RB ._.
But_CC the_DT sea_NN was_VBD not_RB alive_JJ ,_, then_RB ,_, with_IN great_JJ ships_NNS and_CC brave_VB sailors_NNS ,_, sailing_VBG to_TO and_CC from_IN all_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD very_RB lonely_JJ ._.
The_DT Islands_NNPS lay_VBD solitary_JJ ,_, in_IN the_DT great_JJ expanse_NN of_IN water_NN ._.
The_DT foaming_VBG waves_NNS dashed_VBN against_IN their_PRP$ cliffs_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT bleak_JJ winds_NNS blew_VBD over_IN their_PRP$ forests_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT winds_NNS and_CC waves_NNS brought_VBD no_DT adven_NN -_: turers_NNS to_TO land_VB upon_IN the_DT Islands_NNPS ,_, and_CC the_DT savage_JJ Islanders_NNPS knew_VBD nothing_NN of_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN knew_VBD nothing_NN of_IN them_PRP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ supposed_VBN that_IN the_DT Phoenicians_NNPS ,_, who_WP were_VBD an_DT ancient_JJ people_NNS ,_, famous_JJ for_IN carrying_VBG on_IN trade_NN ,_, came_VBD in_IN ships_NNS to_TO these_DT Islands_NNPS ,_, and_CC found_VBD that_IN they_PRP produced_VBD tin_NN and_CC lead_NN ;_: both_CC very_RB useful_JJ things_NNS ,_, as_IN you_PRP know_VBP ,_, and_CC both_DT produced_VBN to_TO this_DT very_RB hour_NN upon_IN the_DT sea_NN -_: coast_NN ._.
The_DT most_RBS celebrated_JJ tin_NN mines_NNS l6_NN A_NN CHILDS_NN HISTORY_NN OF_IN ENGLAND_NNP in_IN Cornwall_NNP are_VBP ,_, still_RB ,_, close_JJ to_TO the_DT sea_NN ._.
One_CD of_IN them_PRP ,_, which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN ,_, is_VBZ so_RB close_JJ to_TO it_PRP that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ hollowed_VBN out_RP under_IN -_: neath_IN the_DT ocean_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT miners_NNS say_VBP ,_, that_IN in_IN stormy_JJ weather_NN ,_, when_WRB they_PRP are_VBP at_IN work_NN down_RB in_IN that_DT deep_JJ place_NN ,_, they_PRP can_MD hear_VB the_DT noise_NN of_IN the_DT waves_NNS thundering_VBG above_IN their_PRP$ heads_NNS ._.
So_RB ,_, the_DT Phoenicians_NNPS ,_, coasting_VBG about_IN the_DT Islands_NNPS ,_, would_MD come_VB ,_, without_IN much_JJ difficulty_NN ,_, to_TO where_WRB the_DT tin_NN and_CC lead_NN were_VBD ._.
The_DT Phoenicians_NNPS traded_VBD with_IN the_DT Islanders_NNPS for_IN these_DT metals_NNS ,_, and_CC gave_VBD the_DT Islanders_NNPS some_DT other_JJ useful_JJ things_NNS in_IN exchange_NN ._.
The_DT Islanders_NNPS were_VBD ,_, at_IN first_RB ,_, poor_JJ savages_NNS ,_, going_VBG almost_RB naked_JJ ,_, or_CC only_RB dressed_VBN in_IN the_DT rough_JJ skins_NNS of_IN beasts_NNS ,_, and_CC staining_VBG their_PRP$ bodies_NNS ,_, as_IN other_JJ savages_NNS do_VBP ,_, with_IN coloured_VBN earths_NNS and_CC the_DT juices_NNS of_IN plants_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT Phoenicians_NNPS ,_, sailing_NN over_IN to_TO the_DT opposite_JJ coasts_NNS of_IN France_NNP and_CC Belgium_NNP ,_, and_CC saying_VBG to_TO the_DT people_NNS there_RB ,_, ''_'' We_PRP have_VBP been_VBN to_TO those_DT white_JJ cliffs_NNS across_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, which_WDT you_PRP can_MD see_VB in_IN fine_JJ weather_NN ,_, and_CC from_IN that_DT country_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ called_VBN Britain_NNP ,_, we_PRP bring_VBP this_DT tin_NN and_CC lead_NN ,_, ''_'' tempted_VBD some_DT of_IN the_DT French_JJ and_CC Belgians_NNPS to_TO come_VB over_RP also_RB ._.
These_DT people_NNS settled_VBD themselves_PRP on_IN the_DT south_JJ coast_NN of_IN England_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ now_RB called_VBN Kent_NNP ;_: and_CC ,_, although_IN they_PRP were_VBD a_DT rough_JJ people_NNS too_RB ,_, they_PRP taught_VBD the_DT savage_JJ Britons_NNPS some_DT useful_JJ arts_NNS ,_, and_CC improved_VBD that_IN part_NN of_IN the_DT Islands_NNPS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN other_JJ people_NNS came_VBD over_IN from_IN Spain_NNP to_TO Ireland_NNP ,_, and_CC settled_VBD there_RB ._.
Thus_RB ,_, by_IN little_JJ and_CC little_JJ ,_, strangers_NNS became_VBD mixed_JJ with_IN the_DT Islanders_NNPS ,_, and_CC the_DT savage_JJ Britons_NNS grew_VBD into_IN a_DT wild_JJ bold_JJ people_NNS ;_: almost_RB savage_JJ ,_, still_RB ,_, especially_RB in_IN the_DT interior_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN away_RB from_IN the_DT sea_NN where_WRB the_DT foreign_JJ settlers_NNS seldom_RB went_VBD ;_: but_CC hardy_JJ ,_, brave_VBP ,_, and_CC strong_JJ ._.
The_DT whole_JJ country_NN was_VBD covered_VBN with_IN forests_NNS ,_, and_CC swamps_NNS ._.
The_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN it_PRP was_VBD very_RB misty_JJ and_CC cold_JJ ._.
There_EX were_VBD no_DT roads_NNS ,_, no_DT bridges_NNS ,_, no_DT streets_NNS ,_, no_DT houses_NNS that_IN you_PRP would_MD think_VB deserving_JJ of_IN the_DT name_NN ._.
A_DT town_NN was_VBD nothing_NN but_CC a_DT collection_NN of_IN straw_NN -_: covered_VBN huts_NNS ,_, hidden_VBN in_IN a_DT thick_JJ wood_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT ditch_NN all_DT round_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT low_JJ wall_NN ,_, made_VBN of_IN mud_NN ._.
or_CC the_DT trunks_NNS of_IN trees_NNS placed_VBD one_CD upon_IN another_DT ._.
The_DT people_NNS planted_VBD little_JJ or_CC no_DT corn_NN ,_, but_CC lived_VBD upon_IN the_DT flesh_NN of_IN their_PRP$ flocks_NNS and_CC cattle_NNS ._.
They_PRP made_VBD no_DT coins_NNS ,_, but_CC used_VBD metal_NN rings_NNS for_IN money_NN ._.
They_PRP were_VBD clever_JJ in_IN basket_NN -_: work_NN ,_, as_IN savage_JJ people_NNS often_RB are_VBP ;_: and_CC they_PRP could_MD make_VB a_DT coarse_JJ kind_NN of_IN cloth_NN ,_, and_CC some_DT very_RB bad_JJ earthenware_NN ._.
But_CC in_IN building_VBG fortresses_NNS they_PRP were_VBD much_RB more_RBR clever_JJ ._.
They_PRP made_VBD boats_NNS of_IN basket_NN -_: work_NN ,_, covered_VBN with_IN the_DT skins_NNS ENGLAND_NNP UNDER_IN THE_DT ROMANS_NN 17_CD of_IN animals_NNS ,_, but_CC seldom_RB ,_, if_IN ever_RB ,_, ventured_VBD far_RB from_IN the_DT shore_NN ._.
They_PRP made_VBD swords_NNS ,_, of_IN copper_NN mixed_VBN with_IN tin_NN ;_: but_CC ._.
these_DT swords_NNS were_VBD of_IN an_DT awkward_JJ shape_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB soft_JJ that_IN a_DT heavy_JJ blow_NN would_MD bend_VB one_CD ._.
They_PRP made_VBD light_JJ shields_NNS ,_, short_JJ pointed_JJ daggers_NNS ,_, and_CC spears_NNS --_: which_WDT they_PRP jerked_VBD back_RB after_IN they_PRP had_VBD thrown_VBN them_PRP at_IN an_DT enemy_NN ,_, by_IN a_DT long_JJ strip_NN of_IN leather_NN fastened_VBD to_TO the_DT stem_NN ._.
The_DT butt_NN -_: end_NN was_VBD a_DT rattle_VBP ,_, to_TO frighten_VB an_DT enemys_JJ horse_NN ._.
The_DT ancient_JJ Britons_NNPS ,_, being_VBG divided_VBN into_IN as_RB many_JJ as_IN thirty_CD or_CC forty_CD tribes_NNS ,_, each_DT commanded_VBN by_IN its_PRP$ own_JJ little_JJ king_NN ,_, were_VBD constantly_RB fighting_VBG with_IN one_CD another_DT ,_, as_IN savage_JJ people_NNS usually_RB do_VBP ;_: and_CC they_PRP always_RB fought_VBD with_IN these_DT weapons_NNS ._.
They_PRP were_VBD very_RB fond_JJ of_IN horses_NNS ._.
The_DT standard_NN of_IN Kent_NNP was_VBD the_DT picture_NN of_IN a_DT white_JJ horse_NN ._.
They_PRP could_MD break_VB them_PRP in_IN and_CC manage_VB them_PRP wonderfully_RB well_RB ._.
Indeed_RB ,_, the_DT horses_NNS -LRB-_-LRB- of_IN which_WDT they_PRP had_VBD an_DT abundance_NN ,_, though_IN they_PRP were_VBD rather_RB small_JJ -RRB-_-RRB- were_VBD so_RB well_RB taught_VBN in_IN those_DT clays_NNS ,_, that_IN they_PRP can_MD scarcely_RB be_VB said_VBN to_TO have_VB improved_VBN since_IN ;_: though_IN the_DT men_NNS are_VBP so_RB much_JJ wiser_JJR ._.
They_PRP understood_VBD ,_, and_CC obeyed_VBN ,_, every_DT word_NN of_IN command_NN ;_: and_CC would_MD stand_VB still_RB by_IN themselves_PRP ._.
in_IN all_PDT the_DT din_NN and_CC noise_NN of_IN battle_NN ,_, while_IN their_PRP$ masters_NNS went_VBD to_TO fight_VB on_IN foot_NN ._.
The_DT Britons_NNPS could_MD not_RB have_VB succeeded_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ most_RBS remarkable_JJ art_NN ._.
without_IN the_DT aid_NN of_IN these_DT sensible_JJ and_CC trusty_JJ animals_NNS ._.
The_DT art_NN I_PRP mean_VBP ,_, is_VBZ the_DT con_NN -_: struction_NN and_CC management_NN of_IN war_NN -_: chariots_NNS or_CC cars_NNS ,_, for_IN which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP ever_RB been_VBN celebrated_VBN in_IN history_NN ._.
Each_DT of_IN the_DT best_JJS sort_NN of_IN these_DT chariots_NNS ,_, not_RB quite_RB breast_NN high_JJ in_IN front_NN ,_, and_CC open_JJ at_IN the_DT back_RB ,_, contained_VBD one_CD man_NN to_TO drive_VB ,_, and_CC two_CD or_CC three_CD others_NNS to_TO fight_VB --_: all_DT standing_VBG up_RP ._.
The_DT horses_NNS who_WP drew_VBD them_PRP were_VBD so_RB well_RB trained_VBN ,_, that_IN they_PRP would_MD tear_VB ,_, at_IN full_JJ gallop_NN ,_, over_IN the_DT most_RBS stony_JJ ways_NNS ,_, and_CC even_RB through_IN the_DT woods_NNS ;_: clashing_VBG down_RP their_PRP$ masters_NNS enemies_NNS beneath_IN their_PRP$ hoofs_NNS ,_, and_CC cutting_VBG them_PRP to_TO pieces_NNS with_IN the_DT blades_NNS of_IN swords_NNS ._.
or_CC scythes_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD fastened_VBN to_TO the_DT wheels_NNS ,_, and_CC stretched_VBD out_RP beyond_IN the_DT car_NN on_IN each_DT side_NN ,_, for_IN that_DT cruel_JJ purpose_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT moment_NN ,_, while_IN at_IN full_JJ speed_NN ,_, the_DT horses_NNS would_MD stop_VB ,_, at_IN the_DT drivers_NNS command_NN ._.
The_DT men_NNS within_IN would_MD leap_VB out_RP ._.
deal_NN blows_NNS about_IN them_PRP with_IN their_PRP$ swords_NNS like_IN hail_NN ,_, hap_NN on_IN the_DT horses_NNS ,_, on_IN the_DT pole_NN ,_, spring_NN back_RB into_IN the_DT chariots_NNS any_DT -_: how_WRB ;_: and_CC ._.
as_RB soon_RB as_IN they_PRP were_VBD safe_JJ ,_, the_DT horses_NNS tore_VBD away_RB again_RB ._.
The_DT Britons_NNPS had_VBD a_DT strange_JJ and_CC terrible_JJ religion_NN ,_, called_VBD the_DT Religion_NNP bf_NN the_DT Druids_NNPS ._.
It_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN brought_VBN 1_CD 8_CD A_DT CHILDS_NN HISTORY_NN OF_IN ENGLAND_NNP over_IN ,_, in_IN very_RB early_JJ times_NNS indeed_RB ,_, from_IN the_DT opposite_JJ country_NN of_IN France_NNP ,_, anciently_RB called_VBN Gaul_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO have_VB mixed_VBN up_RP the_DT worship_NN of_IN the_DT Serpent_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT Sun_NNP and_CC Moon_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT worship_NN of_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT Heathen_NNP Gods_NNS and_CC Goddesses_NNS ._.
Most_JJS of_IN its_PRP$ ceremonies_NNS were_VBD kept_VBN secret_JJ by_IN the_DT priests_NNS ,_, the_DT Druids_NNPS ,_, who_WP pretended_VBD to_TO be_VB enchanters_NNS ,_, and_CC who_WP carried_VBD magicians_NNS wands_NNS ,_, and_CC wore_VBD ,_, each_DT of_IN them_PRP ,_, about_IN his_PRP$ neck_NN ,_, what_WP he_PRP told_VBD the_DT ignorant_JJ people_NNS was_VBD a_DT Serpents_NNP egg_NN in_IN a_DT golden_JJ case_NN ._.
But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ certain_JJ that_IN the_DT Druidical_JJ ceremonies_NNS included_VBD the_DT sacrifice_NN of_IN human_JJ victims_NNS ,_, the_DT torture_VB of_IN some_DT suspected_VBN criminals_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, on_IN particular_JJ occasions_NNS ,_, even_RB the_DT burning_NN alive_JJ ,_, in_IN immense_JJ wicker_NN cages_NNS ,_, of_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN men_NNS and_CC animals_NNS together_RB ._.
The_DT Druid_NNP Priests_NNPS had_VBD some_DT kind_NN of_IN veneration_NN for_IN the_DT Oak_NNP ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT mistletoe_NN --_: the_DT same_JJ plant_NN that_IN we_PRP hang_VBP up_RP in_IN houses_NNS at_IN Christmas_NNP Time_NNP now_RB --_: when_WRB its_PRP$ white_JJ berries_NNS grew_VBD upon_IN the_DT Oak_NNP ._.
They_PRP met_VBD together_RB in_IN dark_JJ woods_NNS ,_, which_WDT they_PRP called_VBD Sacred_JJ Groves_NNS ;_: and_CC there_EX they_PRP instructed_VBD ,_, in_IN their_PRP$ mysterious_JJ arts_NNS ,_, young_JJ men_NNS who_WP came_VBD to_TO them_PRP as_IN pupils_NNS ,_, and_CC who_WP sometimes_RB stayed_VBD with_IN them_PRP as_RB long_RB as_IN twenty_CD years_NNS ._.
These_DT Druids_NNS built_VBN great_JJ Temples_NNS and_CC altars_NNS ,_, open_JJ to_TO the_DT sky_NN ,_, fragments_NNS of_IN some_DT of_IN which_WDT are_VBP yet_RB remaining_VBG ._.
Stone_NN -_: henge_NN ,_, on_IN Salisbury_NNP Plain_NNP ,_, in_IN Wiltshire_NNP ,_, is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS extra_JJ -_: ordinary_JJ of_IN these_DT ._.
Three_CD curious_JJ stones_NNS ,_, called_VBN Kits_NNS Coty_NNP House_NNP ,_, on_IN Bluebell_NNP Hill_NNP ,_, near_IN Maidstone_NNP ,_, in_IN Kent_NNP ,_, form_NN another_DT ._.
We_PRP know_VBP ,_, from_IN examination_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ blocks_NNS of_IN which_WDT such_JJ buildings_NNS are_VBP made_VBN ,_, that_IN they_PRP could_MD not_RB have_VB been_VBN raised_VBN without_IN the_DT aid_NN of_IN some_DT ingenious_JJ machines_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP common_JJ now_RB ,_, but_CC which_WDT the_DT ancient_JJ Britons_NNPS certainly_RB did_VBD not_RB use_VB in_IN making_VBG their_PRP$ own_JJ uncomfortable_JJ houses_NNS ._.
I_PRP should_MD not_RB wonder_VB if_IN the_DT Druids_NNPS ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ pupils_NNS who_WP stayed_VBD with_IN them_PRP twenty_CD years_NNS ,_, knowing_VBG more_JJR than_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT Britons_NNPS ,_, kept_VBD the_DT people_NNS out_IN of_IN sight_NN while_IN they_PRP made_VBD these_DT buildings_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB pretended_VBD that_IN they_PRP built_VBD them_PRP by_IN magic_NN ._.

Above_IN all_DT ,_, it_PRP was_VBD in_IN the_DT Roman_JJ time_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN means_NNS of_IN Roman_NNP ships_NNS ,_, that_IN the_DT Christian_NNP Religion_NNP was_VBD first_JJ brought_VBN into_IN Britain_NNP ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ people_NNS first_RB taught_VBD the_DT great_JJ lesson_NN that_IN ,_, to_TO be_VB good_JJ in_IN the_DT sight_NN of_IN God_NNP ,_, they_PRP must_MD love_VB their_PRP$ neighbours_NNS as_IN themselves_PRP ,_, and_CC do_VBP unto_JJ others_NNS as_IN they_PRP would_MD be_VB done_VBN by_IN ._.

CHAPTER_NN VI_NNP ENGLAND_NNP UNDER_IN HAROLD_NNP HAREFOOT_NNP ,_, HARDICANUTE_NNP ,_, AND_NNP EDWARD_NNP THE_DT CONFESSOR_NNP Canute_NNP left_VBD three_CD sons_NNS ,_, by_IN name_NN Sweyn_NNP ,_, Harold_NNP ,_, and_CC Hardi_NNP -_: canute_NN ;_: but_CC his_PRP$ Queen_NNP ,_, Emma_NNP ,_, once_RB the_DT Flower_NNP of_IN Normandy_NNP ,_, was_VBD the_DT mother_NN of_IN only_JJ Hardicanute_NN ._.

The_DT quarrel_VBP was_VBD so_RB arranged_VBN ;_: and_CC ,_, as_IN Hardicanute_NNP was_VBD in_IN Denmark_NNP troubling_JJ himself_PRP very_RB little_JJ about_IN anything_NN but_CC eating_NN and_CC getting_VBG drunk_JJ ,_, his_PRP$ mother_NN and_CC Earl_NNP Godwin_NNP governed_VBD the_DT south_NN for_IN him_PRP ._.

His_PRP$ brother_NN Alfred_NNP was_VBD not_RB so_RB fortunate_JJ ._.

Some_DT trees_NNS were_VBD stately_JJ ,_, and_CC grew_VBD high_JJ and_CC strong_JJ ;_: some_DT had_VBD fallen_VBN of_IN themselves_PRP ;_: some_DT were_VBD felled_VBN by_IN the_DT foresters_NNS axe_VBP ;_: some_DT were_VBD hollow_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT rabbits_NNS bur_SYM -_: rowed_VBN at_IN their_PRP$ roots_NNS ;_: some_DT few_JJ were_VBD struck_VBN by_IN lightning_NN ,_, and_CC stood_VBD white_JJ and_CC bare_JJ ._.

The_DT songs_NNS of_IN the_DT birds_NNS in_IN the_DT New_NNP Forest_NNP were_VBD pleasanter_RBR to_TO hear_VB than_IN the_DT shouts_NNS of_IN fighting_VBG men_NNS outside_IN ;_: and_CC even_RB when_WRB the_DT Red_NNP King_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ Court_NNP came_VBD hunting_NN through_IN its_PRP$ solitudes_NNS ,_, cursing_NN loud_JJ and_CC riding_VBG hard_RB ,_, with_IN a_DT jingling_VBG of_IN stirrups_NNS and_CC bridles_NNS and_CC knives_NNS and_CC daggers_NNS ,_, they_PRP did_VBD much_RB less_JJR harm_NN there_RB than_IN among_IN the_DT English_NNP or_CC Normans_NNPS ,_, and_CC the_DT stags_NNS died_VBD -LRB-_-LRB- as_IN they_PRP lived_VBD -RRB-_-RRB- far_RB easier_JJR than_IN the_DT people_NNS ._.

If_IN the_DT King_NNP had_VBD had_VBN the_DT magnanimity_NN to_TO say_VB with_IN a_DT kind_NN air_NN ._. ''_''

He_PRP could_MD scarcely_RB have_VB done_VBN anything_NN that_WDT would_MD have_VB been_VBN a_DT better_JJR instance_NN of_IN his_PRP$ real_JJ nature_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT better_JJR warning_NN to_TO fawners_NNS and_CC parasites_NNS not_RB to_TO trust_NN in_IN lion_NN -_: hearted_VBN princes_NNS ._.
He_PRP likewise_RB put_VBD his_PRP$ late_JJ fathers_NNS treasurer_NN in_IN chains_NNS ,_, and_CC locked_VBD him_PRP up_RP in_IN a_DT dungeon_NN from_IN which_WDT he_PRP was_VBD not_RB set_VBN free_JJ until_IN he_PRP had_VBD relinquished_VBN ,_, not_RB only_RB all_PDT the_DT Crown_NNP treasure_NN ,_, but_CC all_PDT his_PRP$ own_JJ money_NN too_RB ._.
So_RB ,_, Richard_NNP certainly_RB got_VBD the_DT Lions_NNPS share_NN of_IN the_DT wealth_NN of_IN this_DT wretched_JJ treasurer_NN ,_, whether_IN he_PRP had_VBD a_DT Lions_NNPS heart_NN or_CC not_RB ._.
He_PRP was_VBD crowned_VBN King_NNP of_IN England_NNP ,_, with_IN great_JJ pomp_NN ,_, at_IN Westminster_NNP :_: walking_VBG to_TO the_DT Cathedral_NN under_IN a_DT silken_JJ canopy_NN stretched_VBN on_IN the_DT tops_NNS of_IN four_CD lances_NNS ,_, each_DT carried_VBN by_IN a_DT great_JJ lord_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN his_PRP$ coronation_NN ,_, a_DT dreadful_JJ murdering_VBG of_IN the_DT Jews_NNPS took_VBD place_NN ,_, which_WDT seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB given_VBN great_JJ delight_NN to_TO numbers_NNS of_IN savage_JJ persons_NNS calling_VBG themselves_PRP Christians_NNS ._.
The_DT King_NNP had_VBD issued_VBN a_DT proclamation_NN forbidding_VBG the_DT Jews_NNPS -LRB-_-LRB- who_WP were_VBD generally_RB hated_VBN ,_, though_IN they_PRP were_VBD the_DT most_RBS useful_JJ merchants_NNS in_IN England_NNP -RRB-_-RRB- to_TO appear_VB at_IN the_DT ceremony_NN ;_: but_CC as_IN they_PRP had_VBD assembled_VBN in_IN London_NNP from_IN all_DT parts_NNS ,_, bringing_VBG presents_NNS to_TO show_VB their_PRP$ respect_NN for_IN the_DT new_JJ Sovereign_NNP ,_, some_DT of_IN them_PRP ventured_VBD down_RP to_TO Westminster_NNP Hall_NNP with_IN their_PRP$ gifts_NNS ;_: which_WDT were_VBD very_RB readily_RB accepted_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ supposed_VBN ,_, now_RB ,_, that_IN some_DT noisy_JJ fellow_NN in_IN the_DT crowd_NN ,_, pretending_VBG to_TO be_VB a_DT very_RB RICHARD_JJ THE_DT FIRST_NNP T09_NN delicate_JJ Christian_NNP ,_, set_VBD up_RP a_DT howl_NN at_IN this_DT ,_, and_CC struck_VBD a_DT Jew_NN who_WP was_VBD trying_VBG to_TO get_VB in_IN at_IN the_DT Hall_NNP door_NN with_IN his_PRP$ present_JJ ._.
A_DT riot_NN arose_VBD ._.
The_DT Jews_NNPS who_WP had_VBD got_VBN into_IN the_DT Hall_NNP ,_, were_VBD driven_VBN forth_RB ;_: and_CC some_DT of_IN the_DT rabble_NN cried_VBD out_RP that_IN the_DT new_JJ King_NNP had_VBD commanded_VBN the_DT unbelieving_JJ race_NN to_TO be_VB put_VBN to_TO death_NN ._.
Thereupon_NNP the_DT crowd_NN rushed_VBD through_IN the_DT narrow_JJ streets_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, slaughtering_VBG all_PDT the_DT Jews_NNPS they_PRP met_VBD ;_: and_CC when_WRB they_PRP could_MD find_VB no_DT more_JJR out_IN of_IN doors_NNS -LRB-_-LRB- on_IN account_NN of_IN their_PRP$ having_VBG fled_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, and_CC fastened_VBD themselves_PRP in_IN -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, they_PRP ran_VBD madly_RB about_RB ,_, breaking_VBG open_JJ all_PDT the_DT houses_NNS where_WRB the_DT Jews_NNPS lived_VBD ,_, rushing_VBG in_IN and_CC stabbing_VBG or_CC spearing_VBG them_PRP ,_, sometimes_RB even_RB flinging_VBG old_JJ people_NNS and_CC children_NNS out_IN of_IN window_NN into_IN blazing_VBG fires_NNS they_PRP had_VBD lighted_VBN up_RP below_IN ._.
This_DT great_JJ cruelty_NN lasted_VBD four_CD -_: and_CC -_: twenty_CD hours_NNS ,_, and_CC only_RB three_CD men_NNS were_VBD punished_VBN for_IN it_PRP ._.
Even_RB they_PRP forfeited_VBD their_PRP$ lives_NNS not_RB for_IN murdering_VBG and_CC robbing_VBG the_DT Jews_NNPS ,_, but_CC for_IN burning_VBG the_DT houses_NNS of_IN some_DT Christians_NNS ._.
King_NNP Kichard_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD a_DT strong_JJ restless_JJ burly_JJ man_NN ,_, with_IN one_CD idea_NN always_RB in_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT very_RB troublesome_JJ idea_NN of_IN breaking_VBG the_DT heads_NNS of_IN other_JJ men_NNS ,_, was_VBD mightily_RB impatient_JJ to_TO go_VB on_IN a_DT Crusade_NN to_TO the_DT Holy_NNP Land_NNP ,_, with_IN a_DT great_JJ army_NN ._.
As_IN great_JJ armies_NNS could_MD not_RB be_VB raised_VBN to_TO go_VB ,_, even_RB to_TO the_DT Holy_NNP Land_NNP ,_, without_IN a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN money_NN ,_, he_PRP sold_VBD the_DT Crown_NN domains_NNS ,_, and_CC even_RB the_DT high_JJ offices_NNS of_IN State_NN ;_: recklessly_RB appointing_VBG noblemen_NNS to_TO rule_VB over_IN his_PRP$ English_JJ subjects_NNS ,_, not_RB because_IN they_PRP were_VBD fit_VBN to_TO govern_VB ,_, but_CC because_IN they_PRP could_MD pay_VB high_JJ for_IN the_DT privilege_NN ._.
In_IN this_DT way_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN selling_VBG pardons_NNS at_IN a_DT dear_RB rate_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN varieties_NNS of_IN avarice_NN and_CC oppression_NN ,_, he_PRP scraped_VBD together_RB a_DT large_JJ treasure_NN ._.

John_NNP would_MD rather_RB have_VB been_VBN made_VBN Kegent_NNP of_IN England_NNP ;_: but_CC he_PRP was_VBD a_DT sly_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC friendly_JJ to_TO the_DT expedition_NN ;_: saying_VBG to_TO himself_PRP ,_, no_DT doubt_NN ,_, ''_'' The_DT more_JJR fighting_NN ,_, the_DT more_RBR chance_NN of_IN my_PRP$ brother_NN being_VBG killed_VBN ;_: and_CC when_WRB he_PRP is_VBZ killed_VBN ,_, then_RB I_PRP become_VBP King_NNP John_NNP !_.
*_SYM Before_IN the_DT newly_RB levied_VBN army_NN departed_VBD from_IN England_NNP ,_, the_DT recruits_NNS and_CC the_DT general_JJ populace_NN distinguished_VBN themselves_PRP by_IN astonishing_JJ cruelties_NNS on_IN the_DT unfortunate_JJ Jews_NNPS :_: whom_WP ,_, in_IN many_JJ large_JJ towns_NNS ,_, they_PRP murdered_VBN by_IN hundreds_NNS in_IN the_DT most_RBS horrible_JJ manner_NN ._.

Upon_IN this_DT ,_, the_DT unjust_JJ Governor_NN became_VBD angry_JJ ,_, and_CC told_VBD the_DT people_NNS that_IN he_PRP approved_VBD of_IN their_PRP$ killing_VBG those_DT Jews_NNPS ;_: and_CC a_DT mischievous_JJ maniac_NN of_IN a_DT friar_NN ,_, dressed_VBN all_DT in_IN white_JJ ,_, put_VBD himself_PRP at_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT assault_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP assaulted_VBD the_DT Castle_NNP for_IN three_CD days_NNS ._.

turned_VBD it_PRP blood_NN -_: red_JJ ,_, Jocen_JJ cut_VBD the_DT throat_NN of_IN his_PRP$ beloved_JJ wife_NN ,_, and_CC stabbed_VBD himself_PRP ._.
All_PDT the_DT others_NNS who_WP had_VBD wives_NNS or_CC children_NNS ,_, did_VBD the_DT like_JJ dreadful_JJ deed_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT populace_NN broke_VBD in_IN ,_, they_PRP found_VBD -LRB-_-LRB- except_IN the_DT trembling_VBG few_JJ ,_, cowering_VBG in_IN corners_NNS ,_, whom_WP they_PRP soon_RB killed_VBD -RRB-_-RRB- only_RB heaps_NNS of_IN greasy_JJ cinders_NNS ,_, with_IN here_RB and_CC there_RB something_NN like_IN part_NN of_IN the_DT blackened_VBN trunk_NN of_IN a_DT burnt_JJ tree_NN ,_, but_CC which_WDT had_VBD lately_RB been_VBN a_DT human_JJ creature_NN ,_, formed_VBN by_IN the_DT beneficent_JJ hand_NN of_IN the_DT Creator_NNP as_IN they_PRP were_VBD ._.
After_IN this_DT bad_JJ beginning_NN ._.

It_PRP was_VBD undertaken_VBN jointly_RB by_IN the_DT King_NNP of_IN England_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ old_JJ friend_NN Philip_NNP of_IN France_NNP ._.

But_CC the_DT French_NNP King_NNP was_VBD in_IN no_DT triumphant_JJ condition_NN ,_, for_IN his_PRP$ army_NN had_VBD been_VBN thinned_VBN by_IN the_DT swords_NNS of_IN the_DT Saracens_NNP ,_, and_CC wasted_VBN by_IN the_DT plague_VBP ;_: and_CC Saladin_NNP ,_, the_DT brave_VBP Sultan_NNP of_IN the_DT Turks_NNPS ,_, at_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN a_DT numerous_JJ army_NN ,_, was_VBD at_IN that_DT time_NN gallantly_RB defending_VBG the_DT place_NN from_IN the_DT hills_NNS that_WDT rise_VBP above_IN it_PRP ._.
Wherever_NNP the_DT united_VBN army_NN of_IN Crusaders_NNPS went_VBD ,_, they_PRP agreed_VBD in_IN few_JJ points_NNS except_IN in_IN gaming_NN ,_, drinking_NN ,_, and_CC quarrelling_VBG ,_, in_IN a_DT most_RBS unholy_JJ manner_NN ;_: in_IN debauching_VBG the_DT people_NNS among_IN whom_WP they_PRP tarried_VBD ,_, whether_IN they_PRP were_VBD friends_NNS or_CC foes_NNS ;_: and_CC in_IN carrying_VBG disturbance_NN and_CC ruin_VB into_IN quiet_JJ places_NNS ._.
The_DT French_NNP King_NNP was_VBD jealous_JJ of_IN the_DT English_NNP King_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT TI2_NN A_NN CHILD_NN S_NN HISTORY_NN OF_IN ENGLAND_NNP English_NNP King_NNP was_VBD jealous_JJ of_IN the_DT French_NNP King_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT dis_NN -_: orderly_JJ and_CC violent_JJ soldiers_NNS of_IN the_DT two_CD nations_NNS were_VBD jealous_JJ of_IN one_CD another_DT ;_: consequently_RB ,_, the_DT two_CD Kings_NNS could_MD not_RB at_IN first_JJ agree_VBP ,_, even_RB upon_IN a_DT joint_JJ assault_NN on_IN Acre_NN ;_: but_CC when_WRB they_PRP did_VBD make_VB up_RP their_PRP$ quarrel_VB for_IN that_DT purpose_NN ,_, the_DT Saracens_NNP promised_VBD to_TO yield_VB the_DT town_NN ,_, to_TO give_VB up_RP to_TO the_DT Christians_NNS the_DT wood_NN of_IN the_DT Holy_NNP Cross_NNP ,_, to_TO set_VB at_IN liberty_NN all_DT their_PRP$ Christian_JJ captives_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO pay_VB two_CD hundred_CD thousand_CD pieces_NNS of_IN gold_NN ._.
All_PDT this_DT was_VBD to_TO be_VB done_VBN within_IN forty_CD days_NNS ;_: but_CC ._.
not_RB being_VBG done_VBN ._.

The_DT French_NNP King_NNP had_VBD no_DT part_NN in_IN this_DT crime_NN ;_: for_IN he_PRP was_VBD by_IN that_DT time_NN travelling_VBG homeward_RB with_IN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ men_NNS ;_: being_VBG offended_VBN by_IN the_DT overbearing_JJ conduct_NN of_IN the_DT English_NNP King_NNP ;_: being_VBG anxious_JJ to_TO look_VB after_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ dominions_NNS ;_: and_CC being_VBG ill_RB ._.
besides_IN ,_, from_IN the_DT unwholesome_JJ air_NN of_IN that_DT hot_JJ and_CC sandy_JJ countiy_NN ._.

Every_DT night_NN when_WRB his_PRP$ army_NN was_VBD on_IN the_DT march_NN ,_, and_CC came_VBD to_TO a_DT halt_NN ,_, the_DT heralds_NNS cried_VBD out_RP three_CD times_NNS ,_, to_TO remind_VB all_PDT the_DT soldiers_NNS of_IN the_DT cause_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD engaged_VBN ._. ''_''

Long_NNP and_CC long_RB after_IN he_PRP was_VBD quiet_JJ in_IN his_PRP$ grave_NN ,_, his_PRP$ terrible_JJ battle_NN -_: axe_NN ._.

Fool_NN ?_.

No_DT one_NN admired_VBD this_DT Kings_NNPS renown_NN for_IN bravery_NN more_RBR than_IN Saladin_NNP himself_PRP ,_, who_WP was_VBD a_DT generous_JJ and_CC gallant_JJ enemy_NN ._.

Money_NN being_NN ,_, in_IN his_PRP$ position_NN ,_, the_DT next_JJ best_JJS thing_NN to_TO men_NNS ._.
King_NNP John_NNP spared_VBD no_DT means_NNS of_IN getting_VBG it_PRP ._.
He_PRP set_VBD on_IN foot_NN another_DT oppressing_VBG and_CC torturing_VBG of_IN the_DT unhappy_JJ Jews_NNS -LRB-_-LRB- which_WDT was_VBD quite_RB in_IN his_PRP$ way_NN -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, and_CC invented_VBD a_DT new_JJ punishment_NN for_IN one_CD wealthy_JJ Jew_NN of_IN Bristol_NNP ._.
Until_IN such_JJ time_NN as_IN that_DT Jew_NN should_MD produce_VB a_DT certain_JJ large_JJ sum_NN of_IN money_NN ,_, the_DT King_NNP sentenced_VBD him_PRP to_TO be_VB imprisoned_VBN ,_, and_CC ,_, every_DT day_NN ,_, to_TO have_VB one_CD tooth_NN violently_RB wrenched_VBD out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ head_NN --_: beginning_VBG with_IN the_DT double_JJ teeth_NNS ._.
For_IN seven_CD days_NNS ,_, the_DT oppressed_JJ man_NN bore_VBD the_DT daily_JJ pain_NN and_CC lost_VBD the_DT daily_JJ tooth_NN ;_: but_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT eighth_JJ ,_, he_PRP paid_VBD the_DT money_NN ._.
With_IN the_DT treasure_NN raised_VBN in_IN such_JJ ways_NNS ,_, the_DT King_NNP made_VBD an_DT expedition_NN into_IN Ireland_NNP ,_, where_WRB some_DT English_NNP nobles_NNS had_VBD revolted_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT veiy_JJ few_JJ places_NNS from_IN which_WDT he_PRP did_VBD not_RB run_VB away_RB ;_: because_IN no_DT resistance_NN was_VBD shown_VBN ._.
JOHN_NN 123_CD He_PRP made_VBD another_DT expedition_NN into_IN Wales_NNP --_: whence_NN he_PRP did_VBD run_VB away_RB in_IN the_DT end_NN :_: but_CC not_RB before_IN he_PRP had_VBD got_VBN from_IN the_DT Welsh_NNP people_NNS ,_, as_IN hostages_NNS ,_, twenty_CD -_: seven_CD young_JJ men_NNS of_IN the_DT best_JJS families_NNS ;_: every_DT one_CD of_IN whom_WP he_PRP caused_VBD to_TO be_VB slain_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ year_NN ._.
To_TO Interdict_VB and_CC Excommunication_NN ,_, the_DT Pope_NNP now_RB added_VBD his_PRP$ last_JJ sentence_NN ;_: Deposition_NN ._.
He_PRP proclaimed_VBD John_NNP no_RB longer_RB King_NNP ,_, absolved_VBD all_PDT his_PRP$ subjects_NNS from_IN their_PRP$ allegiance_NN ,_, and_CC sent_VBD Stephen_NNP Langton_NNP and_CC others_NNS to_TO the_DT King_NNP of_IN France_NNP to_TO tell_VB him_PRP that_IN ,_, if_IN he_PRP would_MD invade_VB England_NNP ,_, he_PRP should_MD be_VB forgiven_VBN all_PDT his_PRP$ sins_NNS --_: at_IN least_JJS ,_, should_MD be_VB forgiven_VBN them_PRP by_IN the_DT Pope_NNP ,_, if_IN that_DT would_MD do_VB ._.
As_IN there_EX was_VBD nothing_NN that_WDT King_NNP Philip_NNP desired_VBN more_JJR than_IN to_TO invade_VB England_NNP ,_, he_PRP collected_VBD a_DT great_JJ army_NN at_IN Rouen_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT fleet_NN of_IN seventeen_CD hundred_CD ships_NNS to_TO bring_VB them_PRP over_RP ._.
But_CC the_DT English_JJ people_NNS ,_, however_RB bitterly_RB they_PRP hated_VBD the_DT King_NNP ,_, were_VBD not_RB a_DT people_NNS to_TO suffer_VB invasion_NN quietly_RB ._.
They_PRP flocked_VBD to_TO Dover_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT English_NNP standard_NN was_VBD ,_, in_IN such_JJ great_JJ numbers_NNS to_TO enrol_VB themselves_PRP as_IN defenders_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ native_JJ land_NN ,_, that_IN there_EX were_VBD not_RB provisions_NNS for_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT King_NNP could_MD only_RB select_VB and_CC retain_VB sixty_CD thousand_CD ._.
But_CC ,_, at_IN this_DT crisis_NN ,_, the_DT Pope_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD his_PRP$ own_JJ reasons_NNS for_IN objecting_VBG to_TO either_CC King_NNP John_NNP or_CC King_NNP Philip_NNP being_VBG too_RB powerful_JJ ,_, interfered_VBD ._.
He_PRP entrusted_VBD a_DT legate_NN ,_, whose_WP$ name_NN was_VBD Pandolf_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT easy_JJ task_NN of_IN frightening_JJ King_NNP John_NNP ._.
He_PRP sent_VBD him_PRP to_TO the_DT English_NNP Camp_NNP ,_, from_IN France_NNP ,_, to_TO terrify_VB him_PRP with_IN exaggerations_NNS of_IN King_NNP Philips_NNP power_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ own_JJ weakness_NN in_IN the_DT dis_NN -_: content_NN of_IN the_DT English_NNP Barons_NNPS and_CC people_NNS ._.
Pandolf_NN discharged_VBD his_PRP$ commission_NN so_RB well_RB ,_, that_IN King_NNP John_NNP ,_, in_IN a_DT wretched_JJ panic_NN ,_, consented_VBD to_TO acknowledge_VB Stephen_NNP Langton_NNP ;_: to_TO resign_VB his_PRP$ kingdom_NN ''_'' to_TO God_NNP ,_, Saint_NNP Peter_NNP ,_, and_CC Saint_NNP Paul_NNP ''_'' --_: which_WDT meant_VBD the_DT Pope_NNP ;_: and_CC to_TO hold_VB it_PRP ,_, ever_RB afterwards_RB ,_, by_IN the_DT Popes_NNS leave_VBP ,_, on_IN payment_NN of_IN an_DT annual_JJ sum_NN of_IN money_NN ._.

That_DT was_VBD the_DT day_NN after_IN this_DT humiliation_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT next_JJ morning_NN came_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT King_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN trembling_VBG all_DT night_NN ,_, found_VBD himself_PRP alive_JJ and_CC safe_JJ ,_, he_PRP ordered_VBD the_DT prophet_NN --_: and_CC his_PRP$ son_NN too_RB --_: to_TO be_VB dragged_VBN through_IN the_DT streets_NNS at_IN the_DT tails_NNS of_IN horses_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB hanged_VBD ,_, for_IN having_VBG frightened_VBN him_PRP ._.
As_IN King_NNP John_NNP had_VBD now_RB submitted_VBN ,_, the_DT Pope_NNP ,_, to_TO King_NNP Philips_NNP great_JJ astonishment_NN ,_, took_VBD him_PRP under_IN his_PRP$ protection_NN ,_, and_CC informed_VBN King_NNP Philip_NNP that_IN he_PRP found_VBD he_PRP could_MD not_RB give_VB him_PRP leave_VB to_TO invade_VB England_NNP ._.
The_DT angry_JJ Philip_NNP resolved_VBN to_TO do_VB it_PRP without_IN his_PRP$ leave_NN ;_: but_CC he_PRP gained_VBD nothing_NN and_CC lost_VBD much_RB ;_: for_IN ,_, the_DT English_NNP ,_, commanded_VBN by_IN the_DT Earl_NNP of_IN Salisbury_NNP ,_, went_VBD over_RB ,_, in_IN five_CD hundred_CD ships_NNS ,_, to_TO the_DT French_JJ coast_NN ,_, before_IN the_DT French_JJ fleet_NN had_VBD sailed_VBN away_RB from_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC utterly_RB defeated_VBD the_DT whole_NN ._.

The_DT King_NNP ,_, who_WP hated_VBD Langton_NNP with_IN all_PDT his_PRP$ might_MD and_CC main_JJ --_: and_CC with_IN reason_NN too_RB ,_, for_IN he_PRP was_VBD a_DT great_JJ and_CC a_DT good_JJ man_NN ,_, with_IN whom_WP such_PDT a_DT King_NNP could_MD have_VB no_DT sympathy_NN --_: pretended_VBD to_TO ciy_VB and_CC to_TO be_VB very_RB grateful_JJ ._.
There_EX was_VBD a_DT little_JJ difficulty_NN about_IN settling_VBG how_WRB much_RB the_DT King_NNP should_MD pay_VB as_IN a_DT recompense_NN to_TO the_DT clergy_NNS for_IN the_DT losses_NNS he_PRP had_VBD caused_VBN them_PRP ;_: but_CC ,_, the_DT end_NN of_IN it_PRP was_VBD ._.
that_IN the_DT superior_JJ clergy_NNS got_VBD a_DT good_JJ deal_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT inferior_JJ clergy_NNS got_VBD little_JJ or_CC nothing_NN --_: which_WDT has_VBZ also_RB happened_VBN since_IN King_NNP Johns_NNP time_NN ,_, I_PRP believe_VBP ._.
When_WRB all_PDT these_DT matters_NNS were_VBD arranged_VBN ,_, the_DT King_NNP in_IN his_PRP$ triumph_NN became_VBD more_RBR fierce_JJ ,_, and_CC false_JJ ,_, and_CC insolent_JJ to_TO all_DT around_IN him_PRP than_IN he_PRP had_VBD ever_RB been_VBN ._.
An_DT alliance_NN of_IN sovereigns_NNS against_IN King_NNP Philip_NNP ,_, gave_VBD him_PRP an_DT opportunity_NN of_IN landing_VBG an_DT army_NN in_IN France_NNP ;_: with_IN which_WDT he_PRP even_RB took_VBD a_DT town_NN !_.
But_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT French_JJ Kings_NNS gaining_VBG a_DT great_JJ victory_NN ,_, he_PRP ran_VBD away_RB ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, and_CC made_VBD a_DT truce_NN for_IN five_CD years_NNS ._.
And_CC now_RB the_DT time_NN approached_VBD when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD to_TO be_VB still_RB further_JJ humbled_VBN ,_, and_CC made_VBN to_TO feel_VB ,_, if_IN he_PRP could_MD feel_VB anything_NN ,_, what_WP a_DT wretched_JJ creature_NN he_PRP was_VBD ._.
Of_IN all_DT men_NNS in_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, Stephen_NNP Langton_NNP seemed_VBD raised_VBN up_RP by_IN Heaven_NNP to_TO oppose_VB and_CC subdue_VB him_PRP ._.

When_WRB he_PRP swore_VBD to_TO restore_VB the_DT laws_NNS of_IN King_NNP Edward_NNP ,_, or_CC the_DT laws_NNS of_IN King_NNP Henry_NNP the_DT First_NNP ,_, Stephen_NNP Langton_NNP knew_VBD his_PRP$ falsehood_NN ,_, and_CC pursued_VBD him_PRP through_IN all_DT his_PRP$ evasions_NNS ._.

When_WRB the_DT King_NNP hid_VBD himself_PRP in_IN London_NNP from_IN the_DT Barons_NNPS ,_, and_CC was_VBD at_IN last_JJ obliged_VBN to_TO receive_VB them_PRP ,_, they_PRP told_VBD him_PRP roundly_RB they_PRP would_MD not_RB believe_VB him_PRP unless_IN Stephen_NNP Langton_NNP became_VBD a_DT surety_NN that_IN he_PRP would_MD keep_VB his_PRP$ word_NN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP took_VBD the_DT Cross_NN to_TO invest_VB himself_PRP with_IN some_DT interest_NN ,_, and_CC belong_VBP to_TO something_NN that_WDT was_VBD received_VBN with_IN favour_NN ,_, Stephen_NNP Langton_NNP was_VBD still_RB immov_JJ -_: able_JJ ._.

At_IN Easter_NNP -_: time_NN ,_, the_DT Barons_NNPS assembled_VBD at_IN Stamford_NNP ,_, in_IN Lincolnshire_NNP ,_, in_IN proud_JJ array_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, marching_VBG near_IN to_TO Oxford_NNP where_WRB the_DT King_NNP was_VBD ,_, delivered_VBN into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN Stephen_NNP Langton_NNP and_CC two_CD others_NNS ,_, a_DT list_NN of_IN grievances_NNS ._. And_CC these_DT ,_, ''_'' they_PRP said_VBD ,_, ''_'' he_PRP must_MD redress_VB ,_, or_CC we_PRP will_MD do_VB it_PRP for_IN ourselves_PRP !_. ''_''
When_WRB Stephen_NNP Langton_NNP told_VBD the_DT King_NNP as_RB much_RB ,_, and_CC read_VB the_DT list_NN to_TO him_PRP ,_, he_PRP went_VBD half_NN mad_JJ with_IN rage_NN ._.
But_CC that_DT did_VBD him_PRP no_DT more_JJR good_JJ than_IN his_PRP$ afterwards_RB trying_VBG to_TO pacify_VB the_DT Barons_NNPS with_IN lies_NNS ._.

Seven_CD knights_NNS alone_RB ,_, of_IN all_PDT the_DT knights_NNS in_IN England_NNP ,_, remained_VBD with_IN the_DT King_NNP ;_: who_WP ,_, reduced_VBN to_TO this_DT strait_NN ,_, at_IN last_JJ sent_VBD the_DT Earl_NNP of_IN Pembroke_NNP to_TO the_DT Barons_NNPS to_TO say_VB that_IN he_PRP approved_VBD of_IN everything_NN ,_, and_CC would_MD meet_VB them_PRP to_TO sign_VB their_PRP$ charter_NN when_WRB they_PRP would_MD ._. Then_RB ,_, ''_'' said_VBD the_DT Barons_NNPS ,_, ''_'' let_VBD the_DT day_NN be_VB the_DT fifteenth_NN of_IN June_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT place_NN ,_, Bunny_NNP -_: Mead_NNP ._. ''_''
On_IN Monday_NNP ,_, the_DT fifteenth_NN of_IN June_NNP ,_, one_CD thousand_CD two_CD 126_CD A_DT CHILD_NN S_NN HISTORY_NN OF_IN ENGLAND_NNP hundred_CD and_CC fourteen_CD ,_, the_DT King_NNP came_VBD from_IN Windsor_NNP Castle_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Barons_NNPS came_VBD from_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Staines_NNP ,_, and_CC they_PRP met_VBD on_IN Runny_NNP -_: Mead_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ still_RB a_DT pleasant_JJ meadow_NN by_IN the_DT Thames_NNP ,_, where_WRB rushes_VBZ grow_VB in_IN the_DT clear_JJ water_NN of_IN the_DT winding_VBG river_NN ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ banks_NNS are_VBP green_JJ with_IN grass_NN and_CC trees_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT Barons_NNPS ,_, came_VBD the_DT General_NNP of_IN their_PRP$ army_NN ,_, Robert_NNP Fitz_NNP -_: Walter_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT great_JJ concourse_NN of_IN the_DT nobility_NN of_IN England_NNP ._.
With_IN the_DT King_NNP ,_, came_VBD ,_, in_IN all_DT ,_, some_DT four_CD -_: and_CC -_: twenty_CD persons_NNS of_IN any_DT note_NN ,_, most_JJS of_IN whom_WP despised_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC were_VBD merely_RB his_PRP$ advisers_NNS in_IN form_NN ._.
On_IN that_DT great_JJ day_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN that_DT great_JJ company_NN ,_, the_DT King_NNP signed_VBD Magna_NNP Charta_NNP --_: the_DT great_JJ charter_NN of_IN England_NNP --_: by_IN which_WDT he_PRP pledged_VBD himself_PRP to_TO maintain_VB the_DT Church_NNP in_IN its_PRP$ rights_NNS ;_: to_TO relieve_VB the_DT Barons_NNS of_IN oppressive_JJ obligations_NNS as_IN vassals_NNS of_IN the_DT Crown_NNP --_: of_IN which_WDT the_DT Barons_NNPS ,_, in_IN their_PRP$ turn_NN ,_, pledged_VBN themselves_PRP to_TO relieve_VB their_PRP$ vassals_NNS ,_, the_DT people_NNS ;_: to_TO respect_VB the_DT liberties_NNS of_IN London_NNP and_CC all_DT other_JJ cities_NNS and_CC boroughs_NNS ;_: to_TO protect_VB foreign_JJ merchants_NNS who_WP came_VBD it_PRP England_NNP ;_: to_TO imprison_VB no_DT man_NN without_IN a_DT fair_JJ trial_NN ;_: and_CC to_TO sell_VB ,_, delay_NN ,_, or_CC deny_VB justice_NN to_TO none_NN ._.
As_IN the_DT Barons_NNPS knew_VBD his_PRP$ falsehood_NN well_RB ,_, they_PRP further_RB required_VBD ,_, as_IN their_PRP$ securities_NNS ,_, that_IN he_PRP should_MD send_VB out_RB of_IN his_PRP$ kingdom_NN all_DT his_PRP$ foreign_JJ troops_NNS ;_: that_IN for_IN two_CD months_NNS they_PRP should_MD hold_VB possession_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN of_IN London_NNP ,_, and_CC Stephen_NNP Langton_NNP of_IN the_DT Tower_NNP ;_: and_CC that_IN five_CD -_: and_CC -_: twenty_CD of_IN their_PRP$ body_NN ,_, chosen_VBN by_IN themselves_PRP ,_, should_MD be_VB a_DT lawful_JJ committee_NN to_TO watch_VB the_DT keeping_VBG of_IN the_DT charter_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO make_VB war_NN upon_IN him_PRP if_IN he_PRP broke_VBD it_PRP ._.
All_PDT this_DT he_PRP was_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO yield_VB ._.
He_PRP signed_VBD the_DT charter_NN with_IN a_DT smile_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, if_IN he_PRP could_MD have_VB looked_VBN agreeable_JJ ,_, would_MD have_VB done_VBN so_RB ,_, as_IN he_PRP departed_VBD from_IN the_DT splendid_JJ assembly_NN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP got_VBD home_NN to_TO Windsor_NNP Castle_NNP ,_, he_PRP was_VBD quite_RB a_DT madman_NN in_IN his_PRP$ helpless_JJ fury_NN ._.
And_CC he_PRP broke_VBD the_DT charter_NN immediately_RB afterwards_RB ._.
He_PRP sent_VBD abroad_RB for_IN foreign_JJ soldiers_NNS ,_, and_CC sent_VBN to_TO the_DT Pope_NNP for_IN help_NN ,_, and_CC plotted_VBN to_TO take_VB London_NNP by_IN surprise_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT Barons_NNS should_MD be_VB holding_VBG a_DT great_JJ tournament_NN at_IN Stamford_NNP ,_, which_WDT they_PRP had_VBD agreed_VBN to_TO hold_VB there_RB as_IN a_DT celebration_NN of_IN the_DT charter_NN ._.
The_DT Barons_NNPS ,_, however_RB ,_, found_VBD him_PRP out_RP and_CC put_VBD it_PRP off_RP ._.
Then_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT Barons_NNPS desired_VBN to_TO see_VB him_PRP and_CC tax_NN him_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ treachery_NN ,_, he_PRP made_VBD numbers_NNS of_IN appointments_NNS with_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC kept_VBD none_NN ,_, and_CC shifted_VBN from_IN place_NN to_TO place_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD constantly_RB sneaking_VBG and_CC skulking_VBG about_RB ._.
At_IN last_JJ he_PRP appeared_VBD at_IN Dover_NNP ,_, to_TO join_VB his_PRP$ foreign_JJ soldiers_NNS ,_, of_IN whom_WP numbers_NNS came_VBD into_IN his_PRP$ pay_NN ;_: and_CC with_IN them_PRP he_PRP besieged_VBD and_CC took_VBD Rochester_NNP JOHN_NNP 127_CD Castle_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD occupied_VBN by_IN knights_NNS and_CC soldiers_NNS of_IN the_DT Barons_NNPS ._.
He_PRP would_MD have_VB hanged_VBN them_PRP every_DT one_CD ;_: but_CC the_DT leader_NN of_IN the_DT foreign_JJ soldiers_NNS ,_, fearful_JJ of_IN what_WP the_DT English_JJ people_NNS might_MD afterwards_RB do_VB to_TO him_PRP ,_, interfered_VBD to_TO save_VB the_DT knights_NNS ;_: therefore_RB the_DT King_NNP was_VBD fain_CD to_TO satisfy_VB his_PRP$ vengeance_NN with_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT common_JJ men_NNS ._.
Then_RB ,_, he_PRP sent_VBD the_DT Earl_NNP of_IN Salisbury_NNP ,_, with_IN one_CD portion_NN of_IN his_PRP$ army_NN ,_, to_TO ravage_VB the_DT eastern_JJ part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ dominions_NNS ,_, while_IN he_PRP carried_VBD fire_NN and_CC slaughter_NN into_IN the_DT northern_JJ part_NN ;_: torturing_VBG ,_, plundering_VBG ,_, killing_VBG ,_, and_CC inflicting_VBG every_DT possible_JJ cruelty_NN upon_IN the_DT people_NNS ;_: and_CC ,_, every_DT morning_NN ,_, setting_VBG a_DT worthy_JJ example_NN to_TO his_PRP$ men_NNS by_IN setting_VBG fire_NN ,_, with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ monster_NN -_: hands_NNS ,_, to_TO the_DT house_NN where_WRB he_PRP had_VBD slept_VBN last_JJ night_NN ._.
Nor_CC was_VBD this_DT all_DT ;_: for_IN the_DT Pope_NNP ,_, coming_VBG to_TO the_DT aid_NN of_IN his_PRP$ precious_JJ friend_NN ,_, laid_VBD the_DT kingdom_NN under_IN an_DT Interdict_NN again_RB ,_, because_IN the_DT people_NNS took_VBD part_NN with_IN the_DT Barons_NNPS ._.
It_PRP did_VBD not_RB much_JJ matter_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT people_NNS had_VBD grown_VBN so_RB used_VBN to_TO it_PRP now_RB ,_, that_IN they_PRP had_VBD begun_VBN to_TO think_VB nothing_NN about_IN it_PRP ._.
It_PRP occurred_VBD to_TO them_PRP --_: perhaps_RB to_TO Stephen_NNP Langton_NNP too_RB --_: that_IN they_PRP could_MD keep_VB their_PRP$ churches_NNS open_JJ ,_, and_CC ring_VBP their_PRP$ bells_NNS ,_, without_IN the_DT Popes_NNPS permission_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN with_IN it_PRP ._.

The_DT Black_JJ Band_NN never_RB blushed_VBD ,_, or_CC they_PRP might_MD have_VB blushed_VBN at_IN this_DT ._.

Disturbances_NNS still_RB took_VBD place_NN ,_, chiefly_RB occasioned_VBN by_IN the_DT avarice_NN and_CC pride_NN of_IN the_DT English_NNP Lords_NNPS ,_, on_IN whom_WP Welsh_NNP lands_NNS and_CC castles_NNS had_VBD been_VBN bestowed_VBN ;_: but_CC they_PRP were_VBD subdued_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT country_NN never_RB rose_VBD again_RB ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT legend_NN that_IN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT people_NNS from_IN being_VBG incited_VBN to_TO rebellion_NN by_IN the_DT songs_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ bards_NNS and_CC harpers_NNS ,_, Edward_NNP had_VBD them_PRP all_DT put_VBP to_TO death_NN ._.

The_DT foreign_JJ war_NN of_IN the_DT reign_NN of_IN Edward_NNP the_DT First_NNP arose_VBD in_IN this_DT way_NN ._.
The_DT crews_NNS of_IN two_CD vessels_NNS ,_, one_CD a_DT Norman_NNP ship_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ an_DT English_JJ ship_NN ,_, happened_VBD to_TO go_VB to_TO the_DT same_JJ place_NN EDWARD_NNP THE_DT FIRST_NNP 147_CD in_IN their_PRP$ boats_NNS to_TO fill_VB their_PRP$ casks_NNS with_IN fresh_JJ water_NN ._.

This_DT siege_NN --_: ever_RB afterwards_RB memorable_JJ --_: lasted_VBD nearly_RB a_DT year_NN ._.

I_PRP hope_VBP the_DT people_NNS of_IN Calais_NNP loved_VBD the_DT daughter_NN to_TO whom_WP she_PRP gave_VBD birth_NN soon_RB afterwards_RB ,_, for_IN her_PRP$ gentle_JJ mothers_NNS sake_NN ._.

Thus_RB it_PRP happened_VBD that_IN he_PRP came_VBD •_CD upon_IN the_DT French_JJ Kings_NNS forces_NNS ,_, all_DT of_IN a_DT sudden_JJ ,_, near_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Poitiers_NNP ,_, and_CC found_VBD that_IN the_DT whole_JJ neighbouring_JJ country_NN was_VBD occupied_VBN by_IN a_DT vast_JJ French_JJ army_NN ._. ''_''
God_NNP help_VB us_PRP !_. ''_''

CHAPTER_NN XX_NN
ENGLAND_NNP UNDER_IN HENRY_NNP THE_DT FOURTH_NN ,_, CALLED_VBN BOLINGBROKE_NNP During_IN the_DT last_JJ reign_NN ,_, the_DT preaching_NN of_IN Wickliffe_NNP against_IN the_DT pride_NN and_CC cunning_JJ of_IN the_DT Pope_NNP and_CC all_PDT his_PRP$ men_NNS ,_, had_VBD made_VBN a_DT great_JJ noise_NN in_IN England_NNP ._.
Whether_IN the_DT new_JJ King_NNP wished_VBD to_TO be_VB in_IN favour_NN with_IN the_DT priests_NNS ,_, or_CC whether_IN he_PRP hoped_VBD ,_, by_IN pretending_VBG to_TO be_VB very_RB religious_JJ ,_, to_TO cheat_VB Heaven_NNP itself_PRP into_IN the_DT belief_NN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD not_RB an_DT usurper_NN ,_, I_PRP dont_VBP know_VB ._.

The_DT Kings_NNPS health_NN sank_VBD more_JJR and_CC more_RBR ,_, and_CC he_PRP became_VBD subject_JJ to_TO violent_JJ eruptions_NNS on_IN the_DT face_NN and_CC to_TO bad_JJ epileptic_JJ fits_NNS ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ spirits_NNS sank_VBD every_DT day_NN ._.

Edward_NNP at_IN Westminster_NNP Abbey_NNP ,_, he_PRP was_VBD seized_VBN with_IN a_DT terrible_JJ fit_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD carried_VBN into_IN the_DT Abbots_NNPS chamber_NN ,_, where_WRB he_PRP presently_RB died_VBD ._.
It_PRP had_VBD been_VBN foretold_VBN that_IN he_PRP would_MD die_VB at_IN Jerusalem_NNP ,_, which_WDT certainly_RB is_VBZ not_RB ._.
and_CC never_RB was_VBD ,_, Westminster_NNP ._.
But_CC ,_, as_IN the_DT Abbots_NNPS room_NN had_VBD long_RB been_VBN called_VBN the_DT Jerusalem_NNP chamber_NN ,_, people_NNS said_VBD it_PRP was_VBD all_PDT the_DT same_JJ thing_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD quite_RB satisfied_JJ with_IN the_DT prediction_NN ._.
The_DT King_NNP died_VBD on_IN the_DT 20th_JJ of_IN March_NNP ,_, 1413_CD ,_, in_IN the_DT forty_CD -_: seventh_JJ year_NN of_IN his_PRP$ age_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT fourteenth_NN of_IN his_PRP$ reign_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD buried_VBN in_IN Canterbury_NNP Cathedral_NNP ._.
He_PRP had_VBD been_VBN twice_RB married_VBN ,_, and_CC had_VBD ,_, by_IN his_PRP$ first_JJ wife_NN ,_, a_DT family_NN of_IN four_CD sons_NNS and_CC two_CD daughters_NNS ._.
Considering_VBG his_PRP$ duplicity_NN before_IN he_PRP came_VBD to_TO the_DT throne_NN ,_, his_PRP$ unjust_JJ seizure_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC above_IN all_DT ,_, his_PRP$ making_VBG that_IN monstrous_JJ law_NN for_IN the_DT burning_NN of_IN what_WP the_DT priests_NNS called_VBN heretics_RB ,_, he_PRP was_VBD a_DT reasonably_RB good_JJ king_NN ,_, as_IN kings_NNS went_VBD ._.
CHAPTER_NN XXI_NN ENGLAND_NNP UNDER_IN HENRY_NNP THE_DT FIFTH_NNP First_NNP Part_NNP ._.
The_DT Prince_NNP of_IN Wales_NNP began_VBD his_PRP$ reign_NN like_IN a_DT generous_JJ and_CC honest_JJ man_NN ._.
He_PRP set_VBD the_DT young_JJ Earl_NNP of_IN March_NNP free_JJ ;_: he_PRP restored_VBD their_PRP$ estates_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ honours_NNS to_TO the_DT Percy_NNP family_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD lost_VBN them_PRP by_IN their_PRP$ rebellion_NN against_IN his_PRP$ father_NN ;_: he_PRP ordered_VBD the_DT imbecile_NN and_CC unfortunate_JJ Richard_NNP to_TO be_VB honour_NN -_: ably_RB buried_VBN among_IN the_DT Kings_NNPS of_IN England_NNP ;_: and_CC he_PRP dismissed_VBD all_PDT his_PRP$ wild_JJ companions_NNS ,_, with_IN assurances_NNS that_IN they_PRP should_MD not_RB want_VB ,_, if_IN they_PRP would_MD resolve_VB to_TO be_VB steady_JJ ,_, faithful_JJ ,_, and_CC true_JJ ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ much_RB easier_JJR to_TO burn_VB men_NNS than_IN to_TO burn_VB their_PRP$ opinions_NNS ;_: and_CC those_DT of_IN the_DT Lollards_NNPS were_VBD spreading_VBG every_DT day_NN ._.
The_DT Lollards_NNPS were_VBD represented_VBN by_IN the_DT priests_NNS --_: probably_RB falsely_RB for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN --_: to_TO entertain_VB treasonable_JJ designs_NNS against_IN the_DT new_JJ King_NNP ;_: and_CC Henry_NNP ,_, suffering_VBG himself_PRP to_TO be_VB worked_VBN upon_IN by_IN these_DT representations_NNS ,_, sacrificed_VBD his_PRP$ friend_NN Sir_NNP John_NNP Oldcastle_NNP ,_, the_DT Lord_NNP Cobham_NNP ,_, to_TO them_PRP ,_, after_IN trying_VBG in_IN vain_JJ to_TO convert_VB him_PRP by_IN arguments_NNS ._.
He_PRP was_VBD declared_VBN guilty_JJ ,_, as_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT sect_NN ,_, and_CC sentenced_VBN to_TO the_DT flames_NNS ;_: but_CC he_PRP escaped_VBD from_IN the_DT Tower_NNP before_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN execution_NN -LRB-_-LRB- post_NN -_: poned_VBN for_IN fifty_CD days_NNS by_IN the_DT King_NNP himself_PRP -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, and_CC summoned_VBD the_DT Lollards_NNPS to_TO meet_VB him_PRP near_IN London_NNP on_IN a_DT certain_JJ day_NN ._.
So_IN the_DT priests_NNS told_VBD the_DT King_NNP ,_, at_IN least_JJS ._.
I_PRP doubt_VBP whether_IN there_EX was_VBD any_DT conspiracy_NN beyond_IN such_JJ as_IN was_VBD got_VBN up_RP by_IN their_PRP$ agents_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT day_NN appointed_VBN ,_, instead_RB of_IN five_CD -_: and_CC -_: twenty_CD thousand_CD men_NNS ,_, under_IN the_DT command_NN of_IN Sir_NNP John_NNP Oldcastle_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT meadows_NNS of_IN St_NNP ._.
Giles_NNP ,_, the_DT King_NNP found_VBD only_RB eighty_CD men_NNS ,_, and_CC no_DT Sir_NNP John_NNP at_IN all_DT ._.
There_EX was_VBD ,_, in_IN another_DT place_NN ,_, an_DT addle_NN -_: headed_VBN brewer_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD gold_JJ trappings_NNS to_TO his_PRP$ horses_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT pair_NN of_IN gilt_NN spurs_VBZ in_IN his_PRP$ breast_NN --_: expecting_VBG to_TO be_VB made_VBN a_DT knight_NN next_JJ day_NN by_IN Sir_NNP John_NNP ,_, and_CC so_RB to_TO gain_VB the_DT right_NN to_TO wear_VB them_PRP --_: but_CC there_EX was_VBD no_DT Sir_NNP John_NNP ,_, nor_CC did_VBD anybody_NN give_VB information_NN respecting_VBG him_PRP ,_, though_IN the_DT King_NNP offered_VBD 198_CD A_DT CHILDS_NN HISTORY_NN OF_IN ENGLAND_NNP great_JJ rewards_NNS for_IN such_JJ intelligence_NN ._.
Thirty_CD of_IN these_DT un_NN -_: fortunate_JJ Lollards_NNS were_VBD hanged_VBN and_CC drawn_VBN immediately_RB ,_, and_CC were_VBD then_RB burnt_JJ ,_, gallows_NNS and_CC all_DT ;_: and_CC the_DT various_JJ prisons_NNS in_IN and_CC around_IN London_NNP were_VBD crammed_VBN full_JJ of_IN others_NNS ._.
Some_DT of_IN these_DT unfortunate_JJ men_NNS made_VBD various_JJ confessions_NNS of_IN treason_NNS -_: able_JJ designs_NNS ;_: but_CC ,_, such_JJ confessions_NNS were_VBD easily_RB got_VBN ,_, under_IN torture_VB and_CC the_DT fear_NN of_IN fire_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP veiy_JJ little_JJ to_TO be_VB trusted_VBN ._.
To_TO finish_VB the_DT sad_JJ story_NN of_IN Sir_NNP John_NNP Oldcastle_NNP at_IN once_RB ,_, I_PRP may_MD mention_VB that_IN he_PRP escaped_VBD into_IN Wales_NNP ,_, and_CC remained_VBD there_EX safely_RB ,_, for_IN four_CD years_NNS ._.
When_WRB discovered_VBN by_IN Lord_NNP Powis_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB doubtful_JJ if_IN he_PRP would_MD have_VB been_VBN taken_VBN alive_JJ --_: so_RB great_JJ was_VBD the_DT old_JJ soldiers_NNS bravery_NN --_: if_IN a_DT miserable_JJ old_JJ woman_NN had_VBD not_RB come_VB behind_IN him_PRP and_CC broken_VBN his_PRP$ legs_NNS with_IN a_DT stool_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD earried_VBN to_TO London_NNP in_IN a_DT horse_NN -_: litter_NN ,_, was_VBD fastened_VBN by_IN an_DT iron_NN chain_NN to_TO a_DT gibbet_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB roasted_JJ to_TO death_NN ._.
To_TO make_VB the_DT state_NN of_IN France_NNP as_IN plain_JJ as_IN I_PRP can_MD in_IN a_DT few_JJ words_NNS ,_, I_PRP should_MD tell_VB you_PRP that_IN the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Orleans_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Burgundy_NNP ,_, commonly_RB called_VBN ''_'' John_NNP without_IN fear_NN ,_, ''_'' had_VBD had_VBN a_DT grand_JJ reconciliation_NN of_IN their_PRP$ quarrel_VB in_IN the_DT last_JJ reign_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD appeared_VBN to_TO be_VB quite_RB in_IN a_DT heavenly_JJ state_NN of_IN mind_NN ._.
Immediately_RB after_IN which_WDT ,_, on_IN a_DT Sunday_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT public_JJ streets_NNS of_IN Paris_NNP ,_, the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Orleans_NNP was_VBD murdered_VBN by_IN a_DT party_NN of_IN twenty_CD men_NNS ,_, set_VBN on_IN by_IN the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Burgundy_NNP --_: according_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ own_JJ deliberate_JJ confession_NN ._.
The_DT widow_NN of_IN King_NNP Richard_NNP had_VBD been_VBN married_VBN in_IN France_NNP to_TO the_DT eldest_JJ son_NN of_IN the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Orleans_NNP ._.
The_DT poor_JJ mad_JJ King_NN was_VBD quite_RB powerless_JJ to_TO help_VB her_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Burgundy_NNP became_VBD the_DT real_JJ master_NN of_IN France_NNP ._.
Isabella_NNP dying_VBG ,_, her_PRP$ husband_NN -LRB-_-LRB- Duke_NNP of_IN Orleans_NNP since_IN the_DT death_NN of_IN his_PRP$ father_NN -RRB-_-RRB- married_VBD the_DT daughter_NN of_IN the_DT Count_NN of_IN Armagnac_NNP ,_, who_WP ,_, being_VBG a_DT much_JJ abler_NN man_NN than_IN his_PRP$ young_JJ son_NN -_: in_IN -_: law_NN ,_, headed_VBD his_PRP$ party_NN ;_: thence_RB called_VBN after_IN him_PRP Armagnacs_NNPS ._.
Thus_RB ,_, France_NNP was_VBD now_RB in_IN this_DT terrible_JJ condition_NN ,_, that_IN it_PRP had_VBD in_IN it_PRP the_DT party_NN of_IN the_DT Kings_NNPS son_NN ,_, the_DT Dauphin_NNP Louis_NNP ;_: the_DT party_NN of_IN the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Burgundy_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD the_DT father_NN of_IN the_DT Dauphins_NNPS ill_RB -_: used_VBN wife_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT party_NN of_IN the_DT Armagnacs_NNPS ;_: all_DT hating_VBG each_DT other_JJ ;_: all_DT fighting_VBG together_RB ;_: all_DT composed_VBN of_IN the_DT most_RBS de_FW -_: praved_JJ nobles_NNS that_IN the_DT earth_NN has_VBZ ever_RB known_VBN ;_: and_CC all_DT tearing_VBG unhappy_JJ France_NNP to_TO pieces_NNS ._.
The_DT late_JJ King_NNP had_VBD watched_VBN these_DT dissensions_NNS from_IN England_NNP ,_, sensible_JJ -LRB-_-LRB- like_IN the_DT French_JJ people_NNS -RRB-_-RRB- that_IN no_DT enemy_NN of_IN France_NNP could_MD injure_VB her_PRP$ more_JJR than_IN her_PRP$ own_JJ nobility_NN ._.
The_DT present_JJ King_NNP now_RB advanced_VBD a_DT claim_NN to_TO the_DT French_JJ throne_NN ._.
His_PRP$ HENRY_NNP THE_DT FIFTH_NN T99_NN demand_NN being_VBG ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, refused_VBD ,_, he_PRP reduced_VBD his_PRP$ proposal_NN to_TO a_DT certain_JJ large_JJ amount_NN of_IN French_JJ territory_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO demanding_VBG the_DT French_JJ princess_NN ,_, Catherine_NNP ,_, in_IN marriage_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT fortune_NN of_IN two_CD millions_NNS of_IN golden_JJ crowns_NNS ._.
He_PRP was_VBD offered_VBN less_RBR territory_NN and_CC fewer_JJR crowns_NNS ,_, and_CC no_DT princess_NN ;_: but_CC he_PRP called_VBD his_PRP$ ambassadors_NNS home_NN and_CC prepared_VBN for_IN war_NN ._.
Then_RB ,_, he_PRP proposed_VBD to_TO take_VB the_DT princess_NN with_IN one_CD million_CD of_IN crowns_NNS ._.
The_DT French_NNP Court_NNP replied_VBD that_IN he_PRP should_MD have_VB the_DT princess_NN with_IN two_CD hundred_CD thousand_CD crowns_NNS less_RBR ;_: he_PRP said_VBD this_DT would_MD not_RB do_VB -LRB-_-LRB- he_PRP had_VBD never_RB seen_VBN the_DT princess_NN in_IN his_PRP$ life_NN -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, and_CC assembled_VBD his_PRP$ army_NN at_IN Southampton_NNP ._.
There_EX was_VBD a_DT short_JJ plot_NN at_IN home_NN just_RB at_IN that_DT time_NN ,_, for_IN deposing_VBG him_PRP ,_, and_CC making_VBG the_DT Earl_NNP of_IN March_NNP king_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT conspirators_NNS were_VBD all_DT speedily_RB condemned_VBN and_CC executed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT King_NNP embarked_VBD for_IN France_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ dreadful_JJ to_TO observe_VB how_WRB long_JJ a_DT bad_JJ example_NN will_MD be_VB followed_VBN ;_: but_CC ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ encouraging_VBG to_TO know_VB that_IN a_DT good_JJ example_NN is_VBZ never_RB thrown_VBN away_RB ._.
The_DT Kings_NNPS first_JJ act_NN on_IN disembarking_VBG at_IN the_DT mouth_NN of_IN the_DT river_NN Seine_NNP ,_, three_CD miles_NNS from_IN Harfleur_NNP ,_, was_VBD to_TO imitate_VB his_PRP$ father_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO proclaim_VB his_PRP$ solemn_JJ orders_NNS that_IN the_DT lives_NNS and_CC property_NN of_IN the_DT peaceable_JJ inhabitants_NNS should_MD be_VB respected_VBN on_IN pain_NN of_IN death_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ agreed_VBN by_IN French_JJ writers_NNS ,_, to_TO his_PRP$ lasting_JJ renown_NN ,_, that_WDT even_RB while_IN his_PRP$ soldiers_NNS were_VBD suffering_VBG the_DT greatest_JJS distress_NN from_IN ,_, want_VB of_IN food_NN ,_, these_DT commands_NNS were_VBD rigidly_RB obeyed_VBN ._.
With_IN an_DT army_NN in_IN all_DT of_IN thirty_CD thousand_CD men_NNS ,_, he_PRP besieged_VBD the_DT town_NN of_IN Harfleur_NNP both_CC by_IN sea_NN and_CC land_NN for_IN five_CD weeks_NNS ;_: at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN which_WDT time_NN the_DT town_NN surrendered_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT inhabitants_NNS were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO depart_VB with_IN only_RB fivepence_JJ each_DT ,_, and_CC a_DT part_NN of_IN their_PRP$ clothes_NNS ._.
All_PDT the_DT rest_NN of_IN their_PRP$ possessions_NNS was_VBD divided_VBN amongst_IN the_DT English_NNP army_NN ._.
But_CC ,_, that_IN army_NN suffered_VBD so_RB much_RB ,_, in_IN spite_NN of_IN its_PRP$ successes_NNS ,_, from_IN disease_NN and_CC privation_NN ,_, that_IN it_PRP was_VBD already_RB reduced_VBN one_CD half_NN ._.
Still_RB ,_, the_DT King_NNP was_VBD determined_VBN not_RB to_TO retire_VB until_IN he_PRP had_VBD struck_VBN a_DT greater_JJR blow_NN ._.
Therefore_RB ,_, against_IN the_DT advice_NN of_IN all_PDT his_PRP$ counsellors_NNS ,_, he_PRP moved_VBD on_IN with_IN his_PRP$ little_JJ force_NN towards_IN Calais_NNP ._.
When_WRB he_PRP came_VBD up_RP to_TO the_DT river_NN Somme_NNP he_PRP was_VBD unable_JJ to_TO cross_VB ,_, in_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT fort_NN being_VBG fortified_VBN ;_: and_CC ,_, as_IN the_DT English_NNP moved_VBD up_RP the_DT left_VBN bank_NN of_IN the_DT river_NN looking_VBG for_IN a_DT crossing_VBG ,_, the_DT French_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD broken_VBN all_PDT the_DT bridges_NNS ,_, moved_VBD up_RP the_DT right_JJ bank_NN ,_, watching_VBG them_PRP ,_, and_CC waiting_VBG to_TO attack_VB them_PRP when_WRB they_PRP should_MD tiy_VB to_TO pass_VB it_PRP ._.
At_IN last_JJ the_DT English_NNP found_VBD a_DT crossing_VBG and_CC got_VBD safely_RB over_RB ._.
200_CD A_DT CHILD_NN S_NN HISTOKY_NN OF_IN ENGLAND_NNP The_NNP French_NNP held_VBD a_DT council_NN of_IN war_NN at_IN Eouen_NNP ,_, resolved_VBN to_TO give_VB the_DT English_JJ battle_NN ,_, and_CC sent_VBD heralds_NNS to_TO King_NNP Henry_NNP to_TO know_VB by_IN which_WDT road_NN he_PRP was_VBD going_VBG ._. ''_''
By_IN the_DT road_NN that_WDT will_MD take_VB me_PRP straight_JJ to_TO Calais_NNP !_. ''_''
said_VBD the_DT King_NNP ,_, and_CC sent_VBD them_PRP away_RP with_IN a_DT present_JJ of_IN a_DT hundred_CD crowns_NNS ._.
The_DT English_NNP moved_VBD on_IN ,_, until_IN they_PRP beheld_VBD the_DT French_JJ ,_, and_CC then_RB the_DT King_NNP gave_VBD orders_NNS to_TO form_VB in_IN line_NN of_IN battle_NN ._.
The_DT French_NNP not_RB coming_VBG on_IN ,_, the_DT army_NN broke_VBD up_RP after_IN remaining_VBG in_IN battle_NN array_NN till_IN night_NN ,_, and_CC got_VBD good_JJ rest_NN and_CC refreshment_NN at_IN a_DT neighbouring_JJ village_NN ._.
The_DT French_JJ were_VBD now_RB all_DT lying_VBG in_IN another_DT village_NN ,_, through_IN which_WDT they_PRP knew_VBD the_DT English_NNP must_MD pass_VB ._.
They_PRP were_VBD resolved_VBN that_IN the_DT English_NNP should_MD begin_VB the_DT battle_NN ._.
The_DT English_NNP had_VBD no_DT means_NNS of_IN retreat_NN ,_, if_IN their_PRP$ King_NNP had_VBD any_DT such_JJ intention_NN ;_: and_CC so_IN the_DT two_CD armies_NNS passed_VBD the_DT night_NN ,_, close_JJ together_RB ._.
To_TO understand_VB these_DT armies_NNS well_RB ,_, you_PRP must_MD bear_VB in_IN mind_NN that_IN the_DT immense_JJ French_JJ army_NN had_VBD ,_, among_IN its_PRP$ notable_JJ persons_NNS ,_, almost_RB the_DT whole_NN of_IN that_DT wicked_JJ nobility_NN ,_, whose_WP$ debauchery_NN had_VBD made_VBN France_NNP a_DT desert_NN ;_: and_CC so_RB besotted_JJ were_VBD they_PRP by_IN pride_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN contempt_NN for_IN the_DT common_JJ people_NNS ,_, that_IN they_PRP had_VBD scarcely_RB any_DT bowmen_NN -LRB-_-LRB- if_IN indeed_RB they_PRP had_VBD any_DT at_IN all_DT -RRB-_-RRB- in_IN their_PRP$ whole_JJ enormous_JJ number_NN :_: which_WDT ,_, compared_VBN with_IN the_DT English_NNP army_NN ,_, was_VBD at_IN least_JJS as_IN six_CD to_TO one_CD ._.
For_IN these_DT proud_JJ fools_NNS had_VBD said_VBN that_IN the_DT bow_NN was_VBD not_RB a_DT fit_JJ weapon_NN for_IN knightly_JJ hands_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN France_NNP must_MD be_VB defended_VBN by_IN gentlemen_NNS only_RB ._.
We_PRP shall_MD see_VB ,_, presently_RB ,_, what_WDT hand_NN the_DT gentlemen_NNS made_VBN of_IN it_PRP ._.
Now_RB ,_, on_IN the_DT English_JJ side_NN ,_, among_IN the_DT little_JJ force_NN ,_, there_EX was_VBD a_DT good_JJ proportion_NN of_IN men_NNS who_WP were_VBD not_RB gentlemen_NNS by_IN any_DT means_NNS ,_, but_CC who_WP were_VBD good_JJ stout_NN archers_NNS for_IN all_DT that_DT ._.
Among_IN them_PRP ,_, in_IN the_DT morning_NN --_: having_VBG slept_VBN little_RB at_IN night_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT French_JJ were_VBD carousing_VBG and_CC making_VBG sure_JJ of_IN victory_NN --_: the_DT King_NNP rode_VBD ,_, on_IN a_DT grey_JJ horse_NN ;_: wearing_VBG on_IN his_PRP$ head_NN a_DT helmet_NN of_IN shining_VBG steel_NN ,_, surmounted_VBN by_IN a_DT crown_NN of_IN gold_NN ,_, sparkling_JJ with_IN precious_JJ stones_NNS ;_: and_CC bearing_VBG over_IN his_PRP$ armour_NN ,_, embroidered_VBN together_RB ,_, the_DT arms_NNS of_IN England_NNP and_CC the_DT arms_NNS of_IN France_NNP ._.
The_DT archers_NNS looked_VBD at_IN the_DT shining_VBG helmet_NN and_CC the_DT crown_NN of_IN gold_NN and_CC the_DT sparkling_JJ jewels_NNS ,_, and_CC admired_VBD them_PRP all_DT ;_: but_CC ,_, what_WP they_PRP admired_VBD most_RBS was_VBD the_DT Kings_NNPS cheerful_JJ face_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ bright_JJ blue_JJ eye_NN ,_, as_IN he_PRP told_VBD them_PRP that_IN ,_, for_IN himself_PRP ,_, he_PRP had_VBD made_VBN up_RP his_PRP$ mind_NN to_TO conquer_VB there_RB or_CC to_TO die_VB there_RB ,_, and_CC that_IN England_NNP should_MD never_RB have_VB a_DT ransom_NN to_TO pay_VB for_IN Jiim_NNP ._.
There_EX was_VBD one_CD brave_VBP knight_NN who_WP HENRY_NNP THE_DT FIFTH_NN 201_CD chanced_VBD to_TO say_VB that_IN he_PRP wished_VBD some_DT of_IN the_DT many_JJ gallant_JJ gentlemen_NNS and_CC good_JJ soldiers_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD then_RB idle_JJ at_IN home_NN in_IN England_NNP ,_, were_VBD there_EX to_TO increase_VB their_PRP$ numbers_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT King_NNP told_VBD him_PRP that_IN ,_, for_IN his_PRP$ part_NN ,_, he_PRP did_VBD not_RB wish_VB for_IN one_CD more_JJR man_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT fewer_JJR we_PRP have_VBP ,_, ''_'' said_VBD he_PRP ,_, ''_'' the_DT greater_JJR will_MD be_VB the_DT honour_NN we_PRP shall_MD win_VB !_. ''_''
His_PRP$ men_NNS ,_, being_VBG now_RB all_DT in_IN good_JJ heart_NN ,_, were_VBD refreshed_VBN with_IN bread_NN and_CC wine_NN ,_, and_CC heard_VBD prayers_NNS ,_, and_CC waited_VBD quietly_RB for_IN the_DT French_NNP ._.
The_DT King_NNP waited_VBD for_IN the_DT French_NNP ,_, because_IN they_PRP were_VBD drawn_VBN up_RP thirty_CD deep_JJ -LRB-_-LRB- the_DT little_JJ English_JJ force_NN was_VBD only_RB three_CD deep_JJ -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, on_IN very_RB difficult_JJ and_CC heavy_JJ ground_NN ;_: and_CC he_PRP knew_VBD that_IN when_WRB they_PRP moved_VBD ,_, there_EX must_MD be_VB confusion_NN among_IN them_PRP ._.
As_IN they_PRP did_VBD not_RB move_VB ,_, he_PRP sent_VBD off_RP two_CD parties_NNS :_: --_: one_CD to_TO lie_VB concealed_VBN in_IN a_DT wood_NN on_IN the_DT left_NN of_IN the_DT French_JJ :_: the_DT other_JJ ,_, to_TO set_VB fire_NN to_TO some_DT houses_NNS behind_IN the_DT French_JJ after_IN the_DT battle_NN should_MD be_VB begun_VBN ._.
This_DT was_VBD scarcely_RB done_VBN ,_, when_WRB three_CD of_IN the_DT proud_JJ French_JJ gentlemen_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD to_TO defend_VB their_PRP$ country_NN without_IN any_DT help_NN from_IN the_DT base_NN peasants_NNS ,_, came_VBD riding_VBG out_RP ,_, calling_VBG upon_IN the_DT English_NNP to_TO surrender_VB ._.
The_DT King_NNP warned_VBD those_DT gentlemen_NNS himself_PRP to_TO retire_VB with_IN all_DT speed_NN if_IN they_PRP cared_VBD for_IN their_PRP$ lives_NNS ,_, and_CC ordered_VBD the_DT English_NNP banners_NNS to_TO advance_NN ._.

206_CD A_DT CHILDS_NN HISTORY_NN OF_IN ENGLAND_NNP And_CC now_RB ,_, with_IN his_PRP$ great_JJ possessions_NNS in_IN France_NNP secured_VBN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ beautiful_JJ wife_NN to_TO cheer_VB him_PRP ,_, and_CC a_DT son_NN born_VBN to_TO give_VB him_PRP greater_JJR happiness_NN ,_, all_DT appeared_VBD bright_JJ before_IN him_PRP ._.

Thereupon_NNP ,_, the_DT triumphant_JJ King_NN -_: Maker_NN and_CC his_PRP$ false_JJ son_NN -_: in_IN -_: law_NN ,_, the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Clarence_NNP ,_, went_VBD to_TO London_NNP ,_, took_VBD the_DT old_JJ King_NNP out_IN of_IN the_DT Tower_NNP ,_, and_CC walked_VBD him_PRP in_IN a_DT great_JJ procession_NN to_TO Saint_NNP Pauls_NNP Cathedral_NNP with_IN the_DT crown_NN upon_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ._.

So_RB ,_, to_TO the_DT Tower_NNP he_PRP was_VBD taken_VBN ,_, very_RB carefully_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Gloucester_NNP was_VBD named_VBN Protector_NNP of_IN the_DT State_NN ._.
Although_IN Gloucester_NNP had_VBD proceeded_VBN thus_RB far_RB with_IN a_DT very_RB smooth_JJ countenance_VBP --_: and_CC although_IN he_PRP was_VBD a_DT clever_JJ man_NN ,_, fair_NN of_IN speech_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB ill_JJ -_: looking_VBG ,_, in_IN spite_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ shoulders_NNS being_VBG something_NN higher_JJR than_IN the_DT other_JJ --_: and_CC although_IN he_PRP had_VBD come_VBN into_IN the_DT City_NNP riding_VBG bare_JJ -_: headed_VBN at_IN the_DT Kings_NNPS side_NN ,_, and_CC looking_VBG very_RB fond_JJ of_IN him_PRP --_: he_PRP had_VBD made_VBN the_DT Kings_NNPS mother_NN more_RBR uneasy_JJ yet_RB ;_: and_CC when_WRB the_DT Royal_NNP boy_NN was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO the_DT Tower_NNP ,_, she_PRP became_VBD so_RB alarmed_JJ that_IN she_PRP took_VBD sanctuary_NN in_IN Westminster_NNP with_IN her_PRP$ five_CD daughters_NNS ._.

Richard_NNP ,_, who_WP looked_VBD down_RP upon_IN them_PRP out_IN of_IN a_DT window_NN and_CC pretended_VBD to_TO be_VB in_IN great_JJ uneasiness_NN and_CC alarm_NN ,_, assured_VBD them_PRP there_EX was_VBD nothing_NN he_PRP desired_VBD less_RBR ,_, and_CC that_IN his_PRP$ deep_JJ affection_NN for_IN his_PRP$ nephews_NNS forbade_VBD him_PRP to_TO think_VB of_IN it_PRP ._.

Upon_IN that_DT ,_, the_DT people_NNS cheered_VBD and_CC dispersed_VBD ;_: and_CC the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Gloucester_NNP and_CC the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Buckingham_NNP passed_VBD a_DT pleasant_JJ evening_NN ,_, talking_VBG over_IN the_DT play_NN they_PRP had_VBD just_RB acted_VBN with_IN so_RB much_JJ success_NN ,_, and_CC every_DT word_NN of_IN which_WDT they_PRP had_VBD prepared_VBN together_RB ._.
CHAPTER_NN XXV_NN ENGLAND_NNP UNDER_IN RICHARD_NNP THE_DT THIRD_NNP King_NNP Richard_NNP the_DT Third_NNP was_VBD up_RB betimes_NNS in_IN the_DT morning_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD to_TO Westminster_NNP Hall_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT Hall_NN was_VBD a_DT marble_NN seat_NN ,_, upon_IN which_WDT he_PRP sat_VBD himself_PRP down_RP between_IN two_CD great_JJ noblemen_NNS ,_, and_CC told_VBD the_DT people_NNS that_IN he_PRP began_VBD the_DT new_JJ reign_NN in_IN that_DT place_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT first_JJ duty_NN of_IN a_DT sovereign_JJ was_VBD to_TO administer_VB the_DT laws_NNS equally_RB to_TO all_DT ,_, and_CC to_TO maintain_VB justice_NN ._.
He_PRP then_RB mounted_VBD his_PRP$ horse_NN and_CC rode_VBD back_RB to_TO the_DT City_NNP ,_, where_WRB he_PRP was_VBD received_VBN by_IN the_DT clergy_NNS and_CC the_DT crowd_NN as_IN if_IN he_PRP really_RB had_VBD a_DT right_NN to_TO the_DT throne_NN ,_, and_CC really_RB were_VBD a_DT just_RB man_NN ._.
The_DT clergy_NNS and_CC the_DT crowd_NN must_MD have_VB been_VBN rather_RB ashamed_JJ of_IN themselves_PRP in_IN secret_NN ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, for_IN being_VBG such_JJ poor_JJ -_: spirited_JJ knaves_NNS ._.
The_DT new_JJ King_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ Queen_NN were_VBD soon_RB crowned_VBN with_IN a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN show_NN and_CC noise_NN ,_, which_WDT the_DT people_NNS liked_VBD very_RB much_RB ;_: and_CC then_RB the_DT King_NNP set_VBD forth_RB on_IN a_DT royal_JJ progress_NN through_IN his_PRP$ dominions_NNS ._.
He_PRP was_VBD crowned_VBN a_DT second_JJ time_NN at_IN York_NNP ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT people_NNS might_MD have_VB show_NN and_CC noise_NN enough_RB ;_: and_CC wherever_WRB he_PRP went_VBD was_VBD received_VBN with_IN shouts_NNS of_IN rejoicing_VBG --_: from_IN a_DT good_JJ many_JJ people_NNS of_IN strong_JJ lungs_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD paid_VBN to_TO strain_VB their_PRP$ throats_NNS in_IN crying_VBG ,_, ''_'' God_NNP save_VB King_NNP Richard_NNP !_. ''_''
The_DT plan_NN was_VBD so_RB successful_JJ that_IN I_PRP am_VBP told_VBD it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN imitated_VBN since_IN ,_, by_IN other_JJ usurpers_NNS ,_, in_IN other_JJ progresses_VBZ through_IN other_JJ dominions_NNS ._.
While_IN he_PRP was_VBD on_IN this_DT journey_NN ,_, King_NNP Richard_NNP stayed_VBD a_DT week_NN at_IN Warwick_NNP ._.
And_CC from_IN Warwick_NNP he_PRP sent_VBD instructions_NNS home_NN for_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT wickedest_JJS murders_NNS that_WDT ever_RB was_VBD done_VBN --_: the_DT murder_NN of_IN the_DT two_CD young_JJ princes_NNS ,_, his_PRP$ nephews_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD shut_VBN up_RP in_IN the_DT Tower_NN of_IN London_NNP ._.
Sir_NNP Robert_NNP Brackenbury_NNP was_VBD at_IN that_DT time_NN Governor_NN of_IN the_DT Tower_NNP ._.
To_TO him_PRP ,_, by_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN a_DT messenger_NN named_VBD John_NNP Green_NNP ,_, did_VBD King_NNP Richard_NNP send_VB a_DT letter_NN ,_, ordering_VBG him_PRP by_IN some_DT means_NNS to_TO put_VB the_DT two_CD young_JJ princes_NNS to_TO death_NN ._.
But_CC Sir_NNP Robert_NNP --_: I_PRP hope_VBP because_IN he_PRP had_VBD children_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, and_CC 242_CD A_DT CHILD_NN S_NN HISTORY_NN OF_IN ENGLAND_NNP loved_VBD them_PRP --_: sent_VBD John_NNP Green_NNP back_RB again_RB ,_, riding_VBG and_CC spurring_VBG along_IN the_DT dusty_JJ roads_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT answer_NN that_IN he_PRP could_MD not_RB do_VB so_RB horrible_JJ a_DT piece_NN of_IN work_NN ._.
The_DT King_NNP ,_, having_VBG frowningly_RB considered_VBN a_DT little_RB ,_, called_VBN to_TO him_PRP Sir_NNP James_NNP Tyrrel_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ master_NN of_IN the_DT hoi_NN -_: se_FW ,_, and_CC to_TO him_PRP gave_VBD authority_NN to_TO take_VB command_NN of_IN the_DT Tower_NNP ,_, whenever_WRB he_PRP would_MD ,_, for_IN twenty_CD -_: four_CD hours_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO keep_VB all_PDT the_DT keys_NNS of_IN the_DT Tower_NNP during_IN that_DT space_NN of_IN time_NN ._.
Tyrrel_NNP ,_, well_RB knowing_VBG what_WP was_VBD wanted_VBN ,_, looked_VBD about_IN him_PRP for_IN two_CD hardened_JJ ruffians_NNS ,_, and_CC chose_VBD John_NNP Dighton_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ grooms_NNS ,_, and_CC Miles_NNP Forest_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD a_DT murderer_NN by_IN trade_NN ._.
Having_VBG secured_VBN these_DT two_CD assistants_NNS ,_, he_PRP went_VBD ,_, upon_IN a_DT day_NN in_IN August_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT Tower_NNP ,_, showed_VBD his_PRP$ authority_NN from_IN the_DT King_NNP ,_, took_VBD the_DT command_NN for_IN four_CD -_: and_CC -_: twenty_CD hours_NNS ,_, and_CC obtained_VBN possession_NN of_IN the_DT keys_NNS ._.
And_CC when_WRB the_DT black_JJ night_NN came_VBD ,_, he_PRP went_VBD creeping_VBG ,_, creeping_VBG ,_, like_IN a_DT guilty_JJ villain_NN as_IN he_PRP was_VBD ,_, up_IN the_DT dark_JJ stone_NN winding_VBG stairs_NNS ,_, and_CC along_IN the_DT dark_JJ stone_NN passages_NNS ,_, until_IN he_PRP came_VBD to_TO the_DT door_NN of_IN the_DT room_NN where_WRB the_DT two_CD young_JJ princes_NNS ,_, having_VBG said_VBD their_PRP$ prayers_NNS ,_, lay_VBD fast_RB asleep_RB ,_, clasped_VBN in_IN each_DT others_NNS arms_NNS ._.
And_CC while_IN he_PRP watched_VBD and_CC listened_VBD at_IN the_DT door_NN ,_, he_PRP sent_VBD in_IN those_DT evil_JJ demons_NNS ,_, John_NNP Dighton_NNP and_CC Miles_NNP Forest_NNP ,_, who_WP smothered_VBD the_DT two_CD princes_NNS with_IN the_DT bed_NN and_CC pillows_NNS ,_, and_CC carried_VBD their_PRP$ bodies_NNS clown_VBP the_DT stairs_NNS ,_, and_CC buried_VBN them_PRP under_IN a_DT great_JJ heap_NN of_IN stones_NNS at_IN the_DT staircase_NN foot_NN ._.
And_CC when_WRB the_DT day_NN came_VBD ,_, he_PRP gave_VBD up_RP the_DT command_NN of_IN the_DT Tower_NNP ,_, and_CC restored_VBD the_DT keys_NNS ,_, and_CC hurried_VBD away_RB without_IN once_RB looking_VBG behind_IN him_PRP ;_: and_CC Sir_NNP Robert_NNP Brackenbury_NNP went_VBD with_IN fear_NN and_CC sadness_NN to_TO the_DT princes_NNS room_NN ,_, and_CC found_VBD the_DT princes_NNS gone_VBN for_IN ever_RB ._.
You_PRP know_VBP ,_, through_IN all_PDT this_DT history_NN ,_, how_WRB true_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ that_IN traitors_NNS are_VBP never_RB true_JJ ,_, and_CC you_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB surprised_VBN to_TO learn_VB that_IN the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Buckingham_NNP soon_RB turned_VBD against_IN King_NNP Richard_NNP ,_, and_CC joined_VBD a_DT great_JJ conspiracy_NN that_WDT was_VBD formed_VBN to_TO dethrone_VB him_PRP ,_, and_CC to_TO place_VB the_DT crown_NN upon_IN its_PRP$ rightful_JJ owners_NNS head_VBP ._.
Richard_NNP had_VBD meant_VBN to_TO keep_VB the_DT murder_NN secret_NN ;_: but_CC when_WRB he_PRP heard_VBD through_IN his_PRP$ spies_NNS that_IN this_DT conspiracy_NN existed_VBD ,_, and_CC that_IN many_JJ lords_NNS and_CC gentlemen_NNS drank_VBD in_IN secret_JJ to_TO the_DT healths_NNS of_IN the_DT two_CD young_JJ princes_NNS in_IN the_DT Tower_NNP ,_, he_PRP made_VBD it_PRP known_VBN that_IN they_PRP were_VBD dead_JJ ._.

He_PRP speedily_RB got_VBD worse_JJR ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO judge_VB what_WP the_DT character_NN of_IN one_CD so_RB young_JJ might_MD afterwards_RB have_VB become_VBN among_IN so_RB many_JJ bad_JJ ,_, ambitious_JJ ,_, quarrelling_VBG nobles_NNS ._.

CHAPTER_NN XXX_NN ENGLAND_NNP UNDER_IN MARY_NNP The_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Northumberland_NNP was_VBD very_RB anxious_JJ to_TO keep_VB the_DT young_JJ Kings_NNS death_NN a_DT secret_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN he_PRP might_MD get_VB the_DT two_CD Princesses_NNPS into_IN his_PRP$ power_NN ._.
But_CC ,_, the_DT Princess_NNP Mary_NNP ,_, being_VBG informed_VBN of_IN that_DT event_NN as_IN she_PRP was_VBD on_IN her_PRP$ way_NN to_TO London_NNP to_TO see_VB her_PRP$ sick_JJ brother_NN ,_, turned_VBD her_PRP$ horses_NNS head_VBP ,_, and_CC rode_VBD away_RB into_IN Norfolk_NNP ._.
The_DT Earl_NNP of_IN Arundel_NNP was_VBD her_PRP$ friend_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD he_PRP who_WP sent_VBD her_PRP$ warning_NN of_IN what_WP had_VBD happened_VBN ._.
As_IN the_DT secret_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB kept_VBN ,_, the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Northumber_NNP -_: land_NN and_CC the_DT council_NN sent_VBN for_IN the_DT Lord_NNP Mayor_NNP of_IN London_NNP and_CC some_DT of_IN the_DT aldermen_NNS ,_, and_CC made_VBD a_DT merit_NN of_IN telling_VBG it_PRP to_TO them_PRP ._.
Then_RB ,_, they_PRP made_VBD it_PRP known_VBN to_TO the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC set_VBN off_RP to_TO inform_VB Lady_NNP Jane_NNP Grey_NNP that_IN she_PRP was_VBD to_TO be_VB Queen_NNP ._.
She_PRP was_VBD a_DT pretty_RB girl_NN of_IN only_RB sixteen_CD ,_, and_CC was_VBD amiable_JJ ,_, learned_VBD ,_, and_CC clever_JJ ._.
When_WRB the_DT lords_NNS who_WP came_VBD to_TO her_PRP ,_, fell_VBD on_IN their_PRP$ knees_NNS before_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC told_VBD her_PRP$ what_WDT tidings_NNS they_PRP brought_VBD ,_, she_PRP was_VBD so_RB astonished_JJ that_IN she_PRP fainted_VBD ._.

She_PRP was_VBD then_RB at_IN Sion_NNP House_NNP ,_, near_IN Brentford_NNP ;_: and_CC the_DT lords_NNS took_VBD her_PRP$ clown_NN the_DT river_NN in_IN state_NN to_TO the_DT Tower_NNP ,_, that_IN she_PRP might_MD remain_VB there_RB -LRB-_-LRB- as_IN the_DT custom_NN was_VBD -RRB-_-RRB- until_IN she_PRP was_VBD crowned_VBN ._.

All_PDT these_DT proceedings_NNS led_VBD to_TO a_DT treaty_NN of_IN peace_NN at_IN Edinburgh_NNP ,_, under_IN which_WDT the_DT French_JJ consented_VBD to_TO depart_VB from_IN the_DT ''_'' kingdom_NN ._.
By_IN a_DT separate_JJ treaty_NN ._.
Mary_NNP and_CC her_PRP$ young_JJ husband_NN engaged_VBD to_TO renounce_VB their_PRP$ assumed_VBN title_NN of_IN King_NNP and_CC Queen_NNP of_IN England_NNP ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN in_IN history_NN ._.
The_DT Massacre_NN of_IN Saint_NNP Bar_NNP -_: tholomew_NN ,_, because_IN it_PRP took_VBD place_NN on_IN Saint_NNP Bartholomews_NNP Eve_NNP ._.

On_IN that_DT day_NN all_PDT the_DT great_JJ leaders_NNS of_IN the_DT Protestants_NNPS -LRB-_-LRB- who_WP were_VBD there_EX called_VBN Huguenots_NNPS -RRB-_-RRB- were_VBD assembled_VBN together_RB ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, as_IN was_VBD represented_VBN to_TO them_PRP ,_, of_IN doing_VBG honour_NN 3M_NNP A_NNP CHILD_NN S_NN HISTORY_NN OF_IN ENGLAND_NNP to_TO the_DT marriage_NN of_IN their_PRP$ chief_NN ,_, the_DT young_JJ King_NNP of_IN Navarre_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT sister_NN of_IN Charles_NNP the_DT Ninth_NNP :_: a_DT miserable_JJ young_JJ King_NNP who_WP then_RB occupied_VBD the_DT French_JJ throne_NN ._.
This_DT dull_JJ creature_NN was_VBD made_VBN to_TO believe_VB by_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN and_CC other_JJ fierce_JJ Catholics_NNPS about_IN him_PRP that_IN the_DT Huguenots_NNPS meant_VBD to_TO take_VB his_PRP$ life_NN ;_: and_CC he_PRP was_VBD persuaded_VBN to_TO give_VB secret_JJ orders_NNS that_WDT ,_, on_IN the_DT tolling_VBG of_IN a_DT great_JJ bell_NN ,_, they_PRP should_MD be_VB fallen_VBN upon_IN by_IN an_DT overpowering_JJ force_NN of_IN armed_JJ men_NNS ,_, and_CC slaughtered_VBN wherever_WRB they_PRP could_MD be_VB found_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT appointed_VBN hour_NN was_VBD close_RB at_IN hand_NN ,_, the_DT stupid_JJ wretch_NN ,_, trembling_VBG from_IN head_NN to_TO foot_NN ,_, was_VBD taken_VBN into_IN a_DT balcony_NN by_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN to_TO see_VB the_DT atrocious_JJ work_NN begun_VBN ._.
The_DT moment_NN the_DT bell_NN tolled_VBD ,_, the_DT murderers_NNS broke_VBD forth_RB ._.
During_IN all_DT that_DT night_NN and_CC the_DT two_CD next_JJ days_NNS ,_, they_PRP broke_VBD into_IN the_DT houses_NNS ,_, fired_VBD the_DT houses_NNS ,_, shot_NN and_CC stabbed_VBD the_DT Protestants_NNPS ,_, men_NNS ,_, women_NNS ,_, and_CC children_NNS ,_, and_CC flung_VBD their_PRP$ bodies_NNS into_IN the_DT streets_NNS ._.
They_PRP were_VBD shot_VBN at_IN in_IN the_DT streets_NNS as_IN they_PRP passed_VBD along_RB ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ blood_NN ran_VBD down_RP the_DT gutters_NNS ._.
Upwards_NNS of_IN ten_CD thousand_CD Protestants_NNPS were_VBD killed_VBN in_IN Paris_NNP alone_RB ;_: in_IN all_DT France_NNP four_CD or_CC five_CD times_NNS that_WDT number_NN ._.
