On_IN Saturday_NNP the_DT seventh_JJ of_IN February_NNP ,_, one_CD thousand_CD six_CD hundred_CD and_CC one_CD ,_, the_DT council_NN suspecting_VBG this_DT ,_, summoned_VBD the_DT Earl_NNP to_TO come_VB before_IN them_PRP ._.

Thomas_NNP Smith_NNP and_CC Mr_NNP ._.

Lord_NNP Bacon_NNP ,_, that_IN able_JJ and_CC wise_JJ philosopher_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT First_NNP Judge_NNP in_IN the_DT Kingdom_NNP in_IN this_DT reign_NN ,_, became_VBD a_DT public_JJ spectacle_NN of_IN dishonesty_NN and_CC corruption_NN ;_: and_CC in_IN his_PRP$ base_NN flattery_NN of_IN his_PRP$ Sowship_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN his_PRP$ crawling_VBG servility_NN to_TO his_PRP$ dog_NN and_CC slave_NN ,_, disgraced_JJ himself_PRP even_RB more_RBR ._.

CHAPTER_NN XXXIII_NN ENGLAND_NNP UNDER_IN CHARLES_NNP THE_DT FIRST_NNP Baby_NNP Charles_NNP became_VBD King_NNP Charles_NNP the_DT First_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT twenty_CD -_: fifth_JJ year_NN of_IN his_PRP$ age_NN ._.

The_DT English_JJ people_NNS were_VBD very_RB well_RB disposed_JJ to_TO like_VB their_PRP$ new_JJ Queen_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO receive_VB her_PRP$ with_IN great_JJ favour_NN when_WRB she_PRP came_VBD among_IN them_PRP as_IN a_DT stranger_NN ._.

Now_RB ,_, you_PRP are_VBP to_TO understand_VB that_IN King_NNP Charles_NNP the_DT First_NNP --_: of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ determination_NN to_TO be_VB a_DT high_JJ and_CC mighty_JJ King_NNP not_RB to_TO be_VB called_VBN to_TO account_VB by_IN anybody_NN ,_, and_CC urged_VBD on_IN by_IN his_PRP$ Queen_NN besides_IN --_: deliberately_RB set_VBN himself_PRP to_TO put_VB his_PRP$ Parlia_NNP -_: ment_NN down_RB and_CC to_TO put_VB himself_PRP up_RP ._.
You_PRP are_VBP also_RB to_TO under_IN -_: stand_VB ,_, that_IN even_RB in_IN pursuit_NN of_IN this_DT wrong_JJ idea_NN -LRB-_-LRB- enough_RB in_IN itself_PRP to_TO have_VB ruined_VBN any_DT king_NN -RRB-_-RRB- he_PRP never_RB took_VBD a_DT straight_JJ course_NN ,_, but_CC always_RB took_VBD a_DT crooked_JJ one_CD ._.
CHARLES_NNP THE_DT FIKST_NN 345_CD He_PRP was_VBD ''_'' bent_JJ upon_IN war_NN with_IN Spain_NNP ,_, though_IN neither_CC the_DT House_NNP of_IN Commons_NNPS nor_CC the_DT people_NNS were_VBD quite_RB clear_JJ as_IN to_TO the_DT justice_NN of_IN that_DT war_NN ,_, now_RB that_IN they_PRP began_VBD to_TO think_VB a_DT little_RB more_RBR about_IN the_DT story_NN of_IN the_DT Spanish_JJ match_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT King_NNP rushed_VBD into_IN it_PRP hotly_RB ,_, raised_VBD money_NN by_IN illegal_JJ means_NNS to_TO meet_VB its_PRP$ expenses_NNS ,_, and_CC encountered_VBD a_DT miserable_JJ failure_NN at_IN Cadiz_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT very_RB first_JJ year_NN of_IN his_PRP$ reign_NN ._.

Five_CD gentlemen_NNS ,_, named_VBN Sir_NNP Thomas_NNP Darnel_NNP ,_, John_NNP Corbet_NNP ,_, Walter_NNP Earl_NNP ,_, John_NNP Heveningham_NNP ,_, and_CC Everard_NNP Hampden_NNP ,_, for_IN refusing_NN were_VBD taken_VBN up_RP by_IN a_DT warrant_NN of_IN the_DT Kings_NNPS privy_JJ council_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO prison_NN without_IN any_DT cause_NN but_CC the_DT Kings_NNPS pleasure_NN being_VBG stated_VBN for_IN their_PRP$ imprisonment_NN ._.

He_PRP highly_RB approved_VBD of_IN the_DT punishment_NN of_IN Doctor_NNP Bastwick_NNP ,_, a_DT physician_NN ;_: who_WP was_VBD also_RB fined_VBN a_DT thousand_CD pounds_NNS ;_: and_CC who_WP afterwards_RB had_VBD his_PRP$ ears_NNS cut_VBD off_RP ,_, and_CC was_VBD imprisoned_VBN for_IN life_NN ._.

He_PRP levied_VBD those_DT duties_NNS of_IN tonnage_NN and_CC poundage_NN ,_, and_CC increased_VBD them_PRP as_IN he_PRP thought_VBD fit_NN ._.
He_PRP granted_VBD monopolies_NNS to_TO companies_NNS of_IN merchants_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ paying_VBG him_PRP for_IN them_PRP ,_, notwithstanding_IN the_DT great_JJ com_NN -_: plaints_NNS that_WDT had_VBD ,_, for_IN years_NNS and_CC years_NNS ,_, been_VBN made_VBN on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN monopolies_NNS ._.

Above_IN all_DT ,_, he_PRP determined_VBD to_TO have_VB what_WP was_VBD called_VBN Ship_NN Money_NN ;_: that_DT is_VBZ 350_CD A_DT CHILDS_NN HISTORY_NN OF_IN ENGLAND_NNP to_TO say_VB ,_, money_NN for_IN the_DT support_NN of_IN the_DT fleet_NN --_: not_RB only_RB from_IN the_DT seaports_NNS ,_, but_CC from_IN all_DT the_DT counties_NNS of_IN England_NNP :_: having_VBG found_VBN out_IN that_IN ,_, in_IN some_DT ancient_JJ time_NN or_CC other_JJ ,_, all_PDT the_DT counties_NNS paid_VBD it_PRP ._.
The_DT grievance_NN of_IN this_DT ship_NN money_NN being_VBG somewhat_RB too_RB strong_JJ ,_, John_NNP Chambers_NNP ,_, a_DT citizen_NN of_IN London_NNP ,_, refused_VBD to_TO pay_VB his_PRP$ part_NN of_IN it_PRP ._.
For_IN this_DT the_DT Lord_NNP Mayor_NNP ordered_VBD John_NNP Chambers_NNP to_TO prison_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN that_DT John_NNP Chambers_NNP brought_VBD a_DT suit_NN against_IN the_DT Lord_NNP Mayor_NNP ._.

This_DT case_NN was_VBD tried_VBN before_IN the_DT twelve_CD judges_NNS in_IN the_DT Court_NNP of_IN Exchequer_NNP ,_, and_CC again_RB the_DT Kings_NNPS lawyers_NNS said_VBD it_PRP was_VBD impossible_JJ that_IN ship_NN money_NN could_MD be_VB wrong_JJ ,_, because_IN the_DT King_NNP could_MD do_VB no_DT wrong_JJ ,_, however_RB hard_RB he_PRP tried_VBD --_: and_CC he_PRP really_RB did_VBD try_VB very_RB hard_RB during_IN these_DT twelve_CD years_NNS ._.
Seven_CD of_IN the_DT judges_NNS said_VBD that_DT was_VBD quite_RB true_JJ ,_, and_CC Mr_NNP ._.

Hampden_NNP was_VBD not_RB bound_VBN to_TO pay_VB ._.
So_RB ,_, the_DT King_NNP tri_SYM -_: umphed_JJ -LRB-_-LRB- as_IN he_PRP thought_VBD -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, by_IN making_VBG Hampden_NNP the_DT most_RBS popular_JJ man_NN in_IN England_NNP ;_: where_WRB matters_NNS were_VBD getting_VBG to_TO that_DT height_NN now_RB ,_, that_IN many_JJ honest_JJ Englishmen_NNP could_MD not_RB endure_VB their_PRP$ country_NN ,_, and_CC sailed_VBD away_RB across_IN the_DT seas_NNS to_TO found_VBN a_DT colony_NN in_IN Massachusetts_NNP Bay_NNP in_IN America_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN Hampden_NNP himself_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ relation_NN Oliver_NNP Crom_NNP -_: well_RB were_VBD going_VBG with_IN a_DT company_NN of_IN such_JJ voyagers_NNS ,_, and_CC were_VBD actually_RB on_IN board_NN ship_NN ,_, when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD stopped_VBN by_IN a_DT proclamation_NN ,_, prohibiting_VBG sea_NN captains_NNS to_TO carry_VB out_RP such_JJ passengers_NNS without_IN the_DT royal_JJ license_NN ._.
But_CC O_NNP !_.
it_PRP would_MD have_VB been_VBN well_RB for_IN the_DT King_NNP if_IN he_PRP had_VBD let_VB them_PRP go_VB !_.
This_DT was_VBD the_DT state_NN of_IN England_NNP ._.
If_IN Laud_NNP had_VBD been_VBN a_DT madman_NN just_RB broke_VBD loose_RB ,_, he_PRP could_MD not_RB have_VB done_VBN more_RBR mischief_NN than_IN he_PRP did_VBD in_IN Scotland_NNP ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Short_NNP Parliament_NNP ,_, for_IN it_PRP lasted_VBD a_DT very_RB little_JJ while_IN ._.
While_IN the_DT members_NNS were_VBD all_DT looking_VBG at_IN one_CD another_DT ,_, doubtful_JJ who_WP would_MD dare_VB to_TO speak_VB ,_, Mr_NNP ._.
Pym_NNP arose_VBD and_CC set_VBD forth_RB all_DT that_IN the_DT King_NNP had_VBD done_VBN unlawfully_RB during_IN the_DT past_JJ twelve_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC what_WP was_VBD the_DT position_NN to_TO which_WDT England_NNP was_VBD reduced_VBN ._.

The_DT King_NNP ,_, a_DT little_JJ frightened_JJ ,_, sent_VBN to_TO say_VB that_IN if_IN they_PRP would_MD grant_VB him_PRP a_DT certain_JJ sum_NN on_IN certain_JJ terms_NNS ,_, no_DT more_JJR ship_NN money_NN should_MD be_VB raised_VBN ._.
They_PRP debated_VBD the_DT matter_NN for_IN two_CD days_NNS ;_: and_CC then_RB ,_, as_IN they_PRP would_MD not_RB give_VB him_PRP all_DT he_PRP asked_VBD without_IN promise_NN or_CC inquiry_NN ,_, he_PRP dissolved_VBD them_PRP ._.
But_CC they_PRP knew_VBD very_RB well_RB that_IN he_PRP must_MD have_VB a_DT Parliament_NNP now_RB ;_: and_CC he_PRP began_VBD to_TO make_VB that_DT discovery_NN too_RB ,_, though_IN rather_RB late_JJ in_IN the_DT day_NN ._.
Wherefore_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT twenty_CD -_: fourth_JJ of_IN September_NNP ,_, being_VBG then_RB at_IN York_NNP with_IN an_DT army_NN collected_VBN against_IN the_DT Scottish_JJ people_NNS ,_, but_CC his_PRP$ own_JJ men_NNS sullen_JJ and_CC discontented_JJ like_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT nation_NN ,_, the_DT King_NNP told_VBD the_DT great_JJ council_NN of_IN the_DT Lords_NNPS ,_, whom_WP he_PRP had_VBD called_VBN to_TO meet_VB him_PRP there_RB ,_, that_IN he_PRP would_MD summon_VB another_DT Parliament_NNP to_TO assemble_VB on_IN the_DT third_JJ of_IN November_NNP ._.
The_DT soldiers_NNS of_IN the_DT Covenant_NNP had_VBD now_RB forced_VBN their_PRP$ way_NN into_IN England_NNP and_CC had_VBD taken_VBN possession_NN of_IN the_DT northern_JJ counties_NNS ,_, where_WRB the_DT coals_NNS are_VBP got_VBN ._.
As_IN it_PRP would_MD never_RB do_VB to_TO be_VB without_IN coals_NNS ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT Kings_NNPS troops_NNS could_MD make_VB no_DT head_NN against_IN the_DT Covenanters_NNP so_RB full_JJ of_IN gloomy_JJ zeal_NN ,_, a_DT truce_NN was_VBD made_VBN ,_, and_CC a_DT treaty_NN with_IN Scotland_NNP was_VBD taken_VBN into_IN 352_CD A_DT CHILDS_NN HISTORY_NN OF_IN ENGLAND_NNP consideration_NN ._.
Meanwhile_RB the_DT northern_JJ counties_NNS paid_VBD the_DT Covenanters_NNP to_TO leave_VB the_DT coals_NNS alone_RB ,_, and_CC keep_VB quiet_JJ ._.

Second_JJ Part_NN ._.
The_DT Long_NNP Parliament_NNP assembled_VBD on_IN the_DT third_JJ of_IN November_NNP ,_, one_CD thousand_CD six_CD hundred_CD and_CC forty_CD -_: one_CD ._.
That_DT day_NN week_NN the_DT Earl_NNP of_IN Strafford_NNP arrived_VBD from_IN York_NNP ,_, very_RB sensible_JJ that_IN the_DT spirited_JJ and_CC determined_VBD men_NNS who_WP formed_VBD that_IN Parliament_NNP were_VBD no_DT friends_NNS towards_IN him_PRP ,_, who_WP had_VBD not_RB only_RB deserted_VBD the_DT cause_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, but_CC who_WP had_VBD on_IN all_DT occasions_NNS opposed_VBD himself_PRP to_TO their_PRP$ liberties_NNS ._.
The_DT King_NNP told_VBD him_PRP ,_, for_IN his_PRP$ com_NN -_: fort_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT Parliament_NNP ;_: should_MD not_RB hurt_VB one_CD hair_NN of_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ._. ''_''
But_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT very_RB next_JJ day_NN Mr_NN ._.
Pym_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT House_NNP of_IN Commons_NNPS ,_, and_CC with_IN great_JJ solemnity_NN ,_, impeached_VBD the_DT Earl_NNP of_IN Strafford_NNP as_IN a_DT traitor_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD immediately_RB taken_VBN into_IN custody_NN and_CC fell_VBD from_IN his_PRP$ proud_JJ height_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD the_DT twenty_CD -_: second_JJ of_IN March_NNP before_IN he_PRP was_VBD brought_VBN to_TO trial_NN in_IN Westminster_NNP Hall_NNP ;_: where_WRB ,_, although_IN he_PRP was_VBD very_RB ill_JJ and_CC suffered_VBD great_JJ pain_NN ,_, he_PRP defended_VBD himself_PRP with_IN such_JJ ability_NN and_CC majesty_NN ,_, that_IN it_PRP was_VBD doubtful_JJ whether_IN he_PRP would_MD not_RB get_VB the_DT best_JJS of_IN it_PRP ._.

''_''
It_PRP was_VBD not_RB clear_JJ whether_IN by_IN the_DT words_NNS ''_'' this_DT kingdom_NN ,_, ''_'' he_PRP had_VBD really_RB meant_VBN England_NNP or_CC Scotland_NNP ;_: but_CC the_DT Parliament_NNP contended_VBD that_IN he_PRP meant_VBD England_NNP ,_, and_CC this_DT was_VBD treason_NNS ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ sitting_VBG of_IN the_DT House_NNP of_IN Commons_NNPS it_PRP was_VBD resolved_VBN to_TO bring_VB in_RP a_DT bill_NN of_IN attainder_NN declaring_VBG the_DT treason_NNS to_TO have_VB been_VBN committed_VBN :_: __CD in_IN preference_NN to_TO proceeding_VBG with_IN the_DT trial_NN by_IN impeachment_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD have_VB required_VBN the_DT treason_NNS to_TO be_VB proved_VBN ._.
So_RB ,_, a_DT bill_NN was_VBD brought_VBN in_RP at_IN once_RB ,_, was_VBD carried_VBN through_IN the_DT House_NNP of_IN Commons_NNPS by_IN a_DT large_JJ majority_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD sent_VBN up_RP to_TO the_DT House_NNP of_IN Lords_NNPS ._. ''_''
While_IN it_PRP was_VBD still_RB uncertain_JJ whether_IN CHARLES_NNP THE_DT FIRST_NNP 353_CD the_DT House_NNP of_IN Lords_NNPS would_MD pass_VB it_PRP and_CC the_DT King_NNP consent_NN to_TO it_PRP ,_, Pym_NNP disclosed_VBD to_TO the_DT House_NNP of_IN Commons_NNPS that_IN the_DT King_NNP and_CC Queen_NNP had_VBD both_DT been_VBN plotting_VBG with_IN the_DT officers_NNS of_IN the_DT army_NN to_TO bring_VB up_RP the_DT soldiers_NNS and_CC control_VB the_DT Parliament_NNP ,_, and_CC also_RB to_TO introduce_VB two_CD hundred_CD soldiers_NNS into_IN the_DT Tower_NN of_IN London_NNP to_TO effect_VB the_DT Earls_NNP escape_NN ._.
The_DT plotting_VBG with_IN the_DT army_NN was_VBD revealed_VBN by_IN one_CD George_NNP Goring_NNP ,_, the_DT son_NN of_IN a_DT lord_NN of_IN that_DT name_NN :_: a_DT bad_JJ fellow_NN who_WP was_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT original_JJ plotters_NNS ,_, and_CC turned_VBD traitor_NN ._.
The_DT King_NNP had_VBD actually_RB given_VBN his_PRP$ warrant_NN for_IN the_DT admission_NN of_IN the_DT two_CD hundred_CD men_NNS into_IN the_DT Tower_NNP ,_, and_CC they_PRP would_MD have_VB got_VBN in_IN too_RB ,_, but_CC for_IN the_DT refusal_NN of_IN the_DT governor_NN --_: a_DT sturdy_JJ Scotchman_NN of_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Balfour_NNP --_: to_TO admit_VB them_PRP ._.
These_DT matters_NNS being_VBG made_VBN public_JJ ,_, great_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN people_NNS began_VBD to_TO riot_NN outside_IN the_DT Houses_NNS of_IN Parliament_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO cry_VB out_RP for_IN the_DT execution_NN of_IN the_DT Earl_NNP of_IN Strafford_NNP ,_, as_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT Kings_NNPS chief_NN instruments_NNS against_IN them_PRP ._.
The_DT bill_NN passed_VBD the_DT House_NNP of_IN Lords_NNPS while_IN the_DT people_NNS were_VBD in_IN this_DT state_NN of_IN agitation_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD laid_VBN before_IN the_DT King_NNP for_IN his_PRP$ assent_NN ,_, together_RB with_IN another_DT bill_NN declaring_VBG that_IN the_DT Parlia_NNP -_: ment_NN then_RB assembled_VBD should_MD not_RB be_VB dissolved_VBN or_CC adjourned_VBN without_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ consent_NN ._.
The_DT King_NNP --_: not_RB unwilling_JJ to_TO save_VB a_DT faithful_JJ servant_NN ,_, though_IN he_PRP had_VBD no_DT great_JJ attachment_NN for_IN him_PRP --_: was_VBD in_IN some_DT doubt_NN what_WDT to_TO do_VB ;_: but_CC he_PRP gave_VBD his_PRP$ consent_NN to_TO both_DT bills_NNS ,_, although_IN he_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ heart_NN believed_VBD that_IN the_DT bill_NN against_IN the_DT Earl_NNP of_IN Strafford_NNP was_VBD unlawful_JJ and_CC unjust_JJ ._.
The_DT Earl_NNP had_VBD written_VBN to_TO him_PRP ,_, telling_VBG him_PRP that_IN he_PRP was_VBD willing_JJ to_TO die_VB for_IN his_PRP$ sake_NN ._.
But_CC he_PRP had_VBD not_RB expected_VBN that_IN his_PRP$ royal_JJ master_NN would_MD take_VB him_PRP at_IN his_PRP$ word_NN quite_RB so_RB readily_RB ;_: for_IN ,_, when_WRB he_PRP heard_VBD his_PRP$ doom_NN ,_, he_PRP laid_VBD his_PRP$ hand_NN upon_IN his_PRP$ heart_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, ''_'' Put_VBD not_RB your_PRP$ trust_NN in_IN Princes_NNPS !_. ''_''
The_DT King_NNP ,_, who_WP never_RB could_MD be_VB straightforward_JJ and_CC plain_JJ ,_, through_IN one_CD single_JJ day_NN or_CC through_IN one_CD single_JJ sheet_NN of_IN paper_NN ,_, wrote_VBD a_DT letter_NN to_TO the_DT Lords_NNPS ,_, and_CC sent_VBD it_PRP by_IN the_DT young_JJ Prince_NNP of_IN Wales_NNP ,_, entreating_VBG them_PRP to_TO prevail_VB with_IN the_DT Commons_NNPS that_WDT ''_'' that_IN unfortunate_JJ man_NN should_MD fulfil_VB the_DT natural_JJ course_NN of_IN his_PRP$ life_NN in_IN a_DT close_JJ imprisonment_NN ._. ''_''

If_IN there_EX had_VBD been_VBN any_DT doubt_NN of_IN his_PRP$ fate_NN ,_, this_DT weakness_NN and_CC meanness_NN would_MD have_VB settled_VBN it_PRP ._.

r_NN ,_, b_NN 354_CD A_DT childs_NNS history_NN of_IN England_NNP Tower_NNP too_RB ;_: and_CC when_WRB the_DT Earl_NNP went_VBD by_IN his_PRP$ window_NN to_TO his_PRP$ death_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD there_RB ,_, at_IN his_PRP$ request_NN ,_, to_TO give_VB him_PRP his_PRP$ blessing_NN ._.
They_PRP had_VBD been_VBN great_JJ friends_NNS in_IN the_DT Kings_NNPS cause_VBP ,_, and_CC the_DT Earl_NNP had_VBD written_VBN to_TO him_PRP in_IN the_DT days_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ power_NN that_IN he_PRP thought_VBD it_PRP would_MD be_VB an_DT admirable_JJ thing_NN to_TO have_VB Mr_NNP ._.
Hampden_NNP publicly_RB whipped_VBD for_IN refusing_VBG to_TO pay_VB the_DT ship_NN money_NN ._.
However_RB ,_, those_DT high_JJ and_CC mighty_JJ doings_NNS were_VBD over_RB now_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT Earl_NNP went_VBD his_PRP$ way_NN to_TO death_NN with_IN dignity_NN and_CC heroism_NN ._.
The_DT governor_NN wished_VBD him_PRP to_TO get_VB into_IN a_DT coach_NN at_IN the_DT Tower_NNP gate_NN ,_, for_IN fear_NN the_DT people_NNS should_MD tear_VB him_PRP to_TO pieces_NNS ;_: but_CC he_PRP said_VBD it_PRP was_VBD all_DT one_CD to_TO him_PRP whether_IN he_PRP died_VBD by_IN the_DT axe_NN or_CC by_IN the_DT peoples_NNS hands_NNS ._.
So_RB ,_, he_PRP walked_VBD ,_, with_IN a_DT firm_NN tread_VB and_CC a_DT stately_JJ look_NN ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB pulled_VBD off_RP his_PRP$ hat_NN to_TO them_PRP as_IN he_PRP passed_VBD along_RB ._.
They_PRP were_VBD profoundly_RB quiet_JJ ._.
He_PRP made_VBD a_DT speech_NN on_IN the_DT scaffold_NN from_IN some_DT notes_NNS he_PRP had_VBD prepared_VBN -LRB-_-LRB- the_DT paper_NN was_VBD found_VBN lying_VBG there_RB after_IN his_PRP$ head_NN was_VBD struck_VBN off_RP -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, and_CC one_CD blow_NN of_IN the_DT axe_NN killed_VBD him_PRP ,_, in_IN the_DT forty_CD -_: ninth_JJ year_NN of_IN his_PRP$ age_NN ._.
This_DT bold_JJ and_CC daring_JJ act_NN ,_, the_DT Parliament_NNP accompanied_VBN by_IN other_JJ famous_JJ measures_NNS ,_, all_DT originating_VBG -LRB-_-LRB- as_IN even_RB this_DT did_VBD -RRB-_-RRB- in_IN the_DT Kings_NNPS having_VBG so_RB grossly_RB and_CC so_RB long_JJ abused_JJ his_PRP$ power_NN ._.
The_DT name_NN of_IN Delinquents_NNS was_VBD applied_VBN to_TO all_DT sheriffs_NNS and_CC other_JJ officers_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN concerned_VBN in_IN raising_VBG the_DT ship_NN money_NN ,_, or_CC any_DT other_JJ money_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, in_IN an_DT unlawful_JJ manner_NN ;_: the_DT Hampden_JJ judgment_NN was_VBD reversed_VBN ;_: the_DT judges_NNS who_WP had_VBD decided_VBN against_IN Hampden_NNP were_VBD called_VBN upon_IN to_TO give_VB large_JJ securities_NNS that_IN they_PRP would_MD take_VB such_JJ consequences_NNS as_IN Parliament_NNP might_MD impose_VB upon_IN them_PRP ;_: and_CC one_CD was_VBD arrested_VBN as_IN he_PRP sat_VBD in_IN High_NNP Court_NNP ,_, and_CC carried_VBD off_RP to_TO prison_NN ._.
Laud_NNP was_VBD impeached_VBN ;_: the_DT unfortunate_JJ victims_NNS whose_WP$ ears_NNS had_VBD been_VBN cropped_VBN and_CC whose_WP$ noses_NNS had_VBD been_VBN slit_JJ ,_, were_VBD brought_VBN out_RB of_IN prison_NN in_IN triumph_NN ;_: and_CC a_DT bill_NN was_VBD passed_VBN declaring_VBG that_IN a_DT Parliament_NNP should_MD be_VB called_VBN every_DT third_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN if_IN the_DT King_NNP and_CC the_DT Kings_NNPS officers_NNS did_VBD not_RB call_VB it_PRP ,_, the_DT people_NNS should_MD assemble_VB of_IN themselves_PRP and_CC summon_VB it_PRP ,_, as_IN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ right_NN and_CC power_NN ._.
Great_JJ illuminations_NNS and_CC rejoicings_NNS took_VBD place_NN over_IN all_DT these_DT things_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT country_NN was_VBD wildly_RB excited_VBN ._.
That_IN the_DT Parliament_NNP took_VBD advantage_NN of_IN this_DT excitement_NN and_CC stirred_VBD them_PRP up_RP by_IN every_DT means_NNS ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN ;_: but_CC you_PRP are_VBP always_RB to_TO remember_VB those_DT twelve_CD long_JJ years_NNS ,_, during_IN which_WDT the_DT King_NNP had_VBD tried_VBN so_RB hard_JJ whether_IN he_PRP really_RB could_MD do_VB any_DT wrong_JJ or_CC not_RB ._.
All_PDT this_DT time_NN there_EX was_VBD a_DT great_JJ religious_JJ outcry_NN against_IN CHARLES_NNP THE_DT FIRST_NNP 355_CD the_DT right_NN of_IN the_DT Bishops_NNS to_TO sit_VB in_IN Parliament_NNP ;_: to_TO which_WDT the_DT Scottish_JJ people_NNS particularly_RB objected_VBD ._.
The_DT English_NNP were_VBD divided_VBN on_IN this_DT subject_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, partly_RB on_IN this_DT account_NN and_CC partly_RB because_IN they_PRP had_VBD had_VBN foolish_JJ expectations_NNS that_IN the_DT Parliament_NNP would_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO take_VB off_RP nearly_RB all_PDT the_DT taxes_NNS ,_, numbers_NNS of_IN them_PRP sometimes_RB wavered_VBD and_CC inclined_JJ towards_IN the_DT King_NNP ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP myself_PRP ,_, that_IN if_IN ,_, at_IN this_DT or_CC almost_RB any_DT other_JJ period_NN of_IN his_PRP$ life_NN ,_, the_DT King_NNP could_MD have_VB been_VBN trusted_VBN by_IN any_DT man_NN not_RB out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ senses_NNS ,_, he_PRP might_MD have_VB saved_VBN himself_PRP and_CC kept_VBD his_PRP$ throne_NN ._.

Some_DT suppose_VBP that_IN he_PRP wanted_VBD to_TO gain_VB over_IN the_DT Scottish_NNP Parliament_NNP ,_, as_IN he_PRP did_VBD in_IN fact_NN gain_NN over_IN ,_, by_IN presents_NNS and_CC favours_VBZ ,_, many_JJ Scottish_JJ lords_NNS and_CC men_NNS of_IN power_NN ._.

With_IN whatever_WDT object_NN he_PRP went_VBD to_TO Scotland_NNP ,_, he_PRP did_VBD little_RB good_JJ by_IN going_VBG At_IN the_DT instigation_NN of_IN the_DT Earl_NNP of_IN Montrose_NNP ,_, a_DT desperate_JJ man_NN who_WP was_VBD then_RB in_IN prison_NN for_IN plotting_VBG ,_, he_PRP tried_VBD to_TO kidnap_VB three_CD Scottish_JJ lords_NNS who_WP escaped_VBD ._.

''_''
--_: that_IN he_PRP sent_VBD for_IN all_DT the_DT Bishops_NNS who_WP were_VBD in_IN town_NN ,_, and_CC proposed_VBN to_TO them_PRP to_TO sign_VB a_DT declaration_NN that_IN ,_, as_IN they_PRP could_MD no_RB longer_RB without_IN danger_NN to_TO their_PRP$ lives_NNS attend_VBP their_PRP$ duty_NN in_IN Parliament_NNP ,_, they_PRP protested_VBD against_IN the_DT lawfulness_NN of_IN every_DT -_: thing_NN done_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ absence_NN ._.
This_DT they_PRP asked_VBD the_DT King_NNP to_TO send_VB to_TO the_DT House_NNP of_IN Lords_NNPS ,_, which_WDT he_PRP did_VBD ._.

At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, he_PRP sent_VBD a_DT messenger_NN to_TO the_DT House_NNP of_IN Commons_NNPS demanding_VBG to_TO have_VB the_DT five_CD gentlemen_NNS who_WP were_VBD members_NNS of_IN that_DT House_NNP immediately_RB produced_VBD ._.

These_DT he_PRP leaves_VBZ in_IN the_DT hall_NN ;_: and_CC then_RB ,_, with_IN his_PRP$ nephew_NN at_IN his_PRP$ side_NN ,_, goes_VBZ into_IN the_DT House_NNP ,_, takes_VBZ off_RP his_PRP$ hat_NN ,_, and_CC walks_VBZ up_RP to_TO the_DT Speakers_NNS chair_NN ._.
The_DT Speaker_NNP leaves_VBZ it_PRP ,_, the_DT King_NNP stands_VBZ in_IN front_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, looks_VBZ about_IN him_PRP steadily_RB for_IN a_DT little_JJ while_NN ,_, and_CC says_VBZ he_PRP has_VBZ come_VBN for_IN those_DT five_CD members_NNS ._.
No_DT one_NN speaks_VBZ ,_, and_CC then_RB he_PRP calls_VBZ John_NNP Pym_NNP by_IN name_NN ._.

The_DT Speaker_NNP ,_, answering_VBG on_IN his_PRP$ knee_NN ,_, nobly_RB replies_VBZ that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ the_DT servant_NN of_IN that_DT House_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ neither_DT eyes_NNS to_TO see_VB ,_, nor_CC tongue_NN to_TO speak_VB ,_, anything_NN but_CC what_WP the_DT House_NNP commands_VBZ him_PRP ._.
Upon_IN this_DT ,_, the_DT King_NNP ,_, beaten_VBN from_IN that_DT time_NN evermore_RB ,_, replies_VBZ that_IN he_PRP will_MD seek_VB them_PRP himself_PRP ,_, for_IN they_PRP have_VBP committed_VBN treason_NNS ;_: and_CC goes_VBZ out_RP ,_, with_IN his_PRP$ hat_NN in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, amid_IN some_DT audible_JJ murmurs_NNS from_IN the_DT members_NNS ._.
No_DT words_NNS can_MD describe_VB the_DT hurry_NN that_WDT arose_VBD out_IN of_IN doors_NNS when_WRB all_PDT this_DT was_VBD known_VBN ._.

At_IN ten_CD oclock_NN in_IN the_DT morning_NN ,_, the_DT King_NNP already_RB frightened_VBD at_IN what_WP he_PRP had_VBD done_VBN ,_, came_VBD to_TO the_DT Guildhall_NNP ,_, with_IN only_RB half_PDT a_DT dozen_NN lords_NNS ,_, and_CC made_VBD a_DT speech_NN to_TO the_DT people_NNS ,_, hoping_VBG they_PRP would_MD not_RB shelter_NN those_DT whom_WP he_PRP accused_VBD of_IN treason_NNS ._.
Next_JJ day_NN ,_, he_PRP issued_VBD a_DT proclamation_NN for_IN the_DT apprehension_NN of_IN the_DT five_CD members_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT Parliament_NNP minded_VBD it_PRP so_RB little_RB that_IN they_PRP made_VBD great_JJ arrangements_NNS for_IN having_VBG them_PRP brought_VBD down_RP to_TO Westminster_NNP in_IN great_JJ state_NN ,_, 358_CD A_DT CHILDa_JJ HISTOKY_NN OF_IN ENGLAND_NNP five_CD days_NNS afterwards_RB ._.
The_DT King_NNP was_VBD so_RB alarmed_JJ now_RB at_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ imprudence_NN ,_, if_IN not_RB for_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ safety_NN ,_, that_IN he_PRP left_VBD his_PRP$ palace_NN at_IN Whitehall_NNP ,_, and_CC went_VBD away_RB with_IN his_PRP$ Queen_NN and_CC children_NNS to_TO Hampton_NNP Court_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD the_DT eleventh_NN of_IN May_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT five_CD members_NNS were_VBD carried_VBN in_IN state_NN and_CC triumph_NN to_TO Westminster_NNP ._.
They_PRP were_VBD taken_VBN by_IN water_NN ._.
The_DT river_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB seen_VBN for_IN the_DT boats_NNS on_IN it_PRP ;_: and_CC the_DT five_CD members_NNS were_VBD hemmed_VBN in_IN by_IN barges_NNS full_JJ of_IN men_NNS and_CC great_JJ guns_NNS ,_, ready_JJ to_TO protect_VB them_PRP ,_, at_IN any_DT cost_NN ._.
Along_IN the_DT Strand_NNP a_DT large_JJ body_NN of_IN the_DT train_NN -_: bands_NNS of_IN London_NNP ,_, under_IN their_PRP$ commander_NN ,_, Skippon_NNP ,_, marched_VBD to_TO be_VB ready_JJ to_TO assist_VB the_DT little_JJ fleet_NN ._.

''_''
With_IN this_DT great_JJ noise_NN outside_IN the_DT House_NNP of_IN Commons_NNPS ,_, and_CC with_IN great_JJ silence_NN within_IN ,_, Mr_NNP ._.

Upon_IN that_DT ,_, the_DT House_NNP called_VBD the_DT sheriffs_NNS in_IN and_CC thanked_VBD them_PRP ,_, and_CC requested_VBD the_DT train_NN -_: bands_NNS ,_, under_IN their_PRP$ commander_NN Skippon_NNP ,_, to_TO guard_VB the_DT House_NNP of_IN Commons_NNPS every_DT day_NN ._.
Then_RB ,_, came_VBD four_CD thousand_CD men_NNS on_IN horseback_NN out_IN of_IN Buckinghamshire_NNP ,_, offering_VBG their_PRP$ services_NNS as_IN a_DT guard_NN too_RB ,_, and_CC bearing_VBG a_DT petition_NN to_TO the_DT King_NNP ,_, complaining_VBG of_IN the_DT injury_NN that_WDT had_VBD been_VBN done_VBN to_TO Mr_NNP ._.
Hampden_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD their_PRP$ county_NN man_NN and_CC much_JJ beloved_JJ and_CC honoured_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT King_NNP set_VBD off_RP for_IN Hampton_NNP Court_NNP ,_, the_DT gentlemen_NNS and_CC soldiers_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN with_IN him_PRP followed_VBD him_PRP out_IN of_IN town_NN as_IN far_RB as_IN Kingston_NNP -_: upon_IN -_: Thames_NNS ;_: next_JJ day_NN ,_, Lord_NNP Digby_NNP came_VBD to_TO them_PRP from_IN the_DT King_NNP at_IN Hampton_NNP Court_NNP ,_, in_IN his_PRP$ coach_NN and_CC six_CD ,_, to_TO inform_VB them_PRP that_IN the_DT King_NNP accepted_VBD their_PRP$ protec_NN -_: tion_NN ._.
This_DT ,_, the_DT Parliament_NNP said_VBD ,_, was_VBD making_VBG war_NN against_IN the_DT kingdom_NN ,_, and_CC Lord_NNP Digby_NNP fled_VBD abroad_RB ._.
The_DT Parliament_NNP then_RB immediately_RB applied_VBN themselves_PRP to_TO getting_VBG hold_NN of_IN the_DT military_JJ power_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, well_RB knowing_VBG that_IN the_DT King_NNP was_VBD already_RB trying_VBG hard_JJ to_TO use_VB it_PRP against_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP had_VBD secretly_RB sent_VBN the_DT Earl_NNP of_IN Newcastle_NNP to_TO Hull_NNP ,_, to_TO secure_VB a_DT valuable_JJ magazine_NN of_IN arms_NNS and_CC gunpowder_NN that_WDT was_VBD there_RB ._.

CHAPTER_NN XXXIV_NN ENGLAND_NNP UNDER_IN OLIVER_NNP CROMWELL_NNP Before_IN sunset_NN on_IN the_DT memorable_JJ day_NN on_IN -_: which_WDT King_NNP Charles_NNP the_DT First_NNP was_VBD executed_VBN ,_, the_DT House_NNP of_IN Commons_NNPS passed_VBD an_DT act_NN declaring_VBG it_PRP treason_NNS in_IN any_DT one_CD to_TO proclaim_VB the_DT Prince_NNP of_IN Wales_NNP --_: or_CC anybody_NN else_RB --_: King_NNP of_IN England_NNP ._.
Soon_RB afterwards_RB ,_, it_PRP declared_VBD that_IN the_DT House_NNP of_IN Lords_NNPS was_VBD useless_JJ and_CC dangerous_JJ ,_, and_CC ought_MD to_TO be_VB abolished_VBN ;_: and_CC directed_VBD that_IN the_DT late_JJ Kings_NNS statue_NN should_MD be_VB taken_VBN down_RP from_IN the_DT Royal_NNP Exchange_NNP in_IN the_DT City_NNP and_CC other_JJ public_JJ places_NNS ._.
Having_VBG laid_VBN hold_NN of_IN some_DT famous_JJ Royalists_NNPS who_WP had_VBD escaped_VBN from_IN prison_NN ,_, and_CC having_VBG beheaded_VBN the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Hamilton_NNP ,_, Lord_NNP Holland_NNP ,_, and_CC Lord_NNP Capel_NNP ,_, in_IN Palace_NN Yard_NN -LRB-_-LRB- all_DT of_IN whom_WP died_VBD very_RB courageously_RB -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, they_PRP then_RB appointed_VBD a_DT Council_NNP of_IN State_NNP to_TO govern_VB the_DT country_NN ._.
It_PRP consisted_VBD of_IN forty_CD -_: one_CD members_NNS ,_, of_IN whom_WP five_CD were_VBD peers_NNS ._.
Bradshaw_NNP was_VBD made_VBN president_NN ._.
The_DT House_NNP of_IN Commons_NNP also_RB re_SYM -_: admitted_VBN members_NNS who_WP had_VBD opposed_VBN the_DT Kings_NNPS death_NN ,_, and_CC made_VBD up_RP its_PRP$ numbers_NNS to_TO about_IN a_DT hundred_CD and_CC fifty_CD ._.
But_CC ,_, it_PRP still_RB had_VBD an_DT army_NN of_IN more_JJR than_IN forty_CD thousand_CD men_NNS to_TO deal_VB with_IN ,_, and_CC a_DT very_RB hard_JJ task_NN it_PRP was_VBD to_TO manage_VB them_PRP ._.
Before_IN the_DT Kings_NNPS execution_NN ,_, the_DT army_NN had_VBD appointed_VBN some_DT of_IN its_PRP$ officers_NNS to_TO remonstrate_VB between_IN them_PRP and_CC the_DT Parliament_NNP :_: and_CC now_RB the_DT common_JJ soldiers_NNS began_VBD to_TO take_VB that_DT office_NN upon_IN themselves_PRP ._.
The_DT regiments_NNS under_IN orders_NNS for_IN Ireland_NNP mutinied_VBD ;_: one_CD troop_NN of_IN horse_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN of_IN London_NNP seized_VBD their_PRP$ own_JJ flag_NN ,_, and_CC refused_VBD to_TO obey_VB orders_NNS ._.
For_IN this_DT ,_, the_DT ringleader_NN was_VBD shot_VBN :_: which_WDT did_VBD not_RB mend_VB the_DT matter_NN ,_, for_IN ,_, both_DT his_PRP$ comrades_NNS and_CC the_DT people_NNS made_VBD a_DT public_JJ funeral_NN for_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC accompanied_VBD the_DT body_NN to_TO the_DT grave_NN with_IN sound_NN of_IN trumpets_VBZ and_CC with_IN a_DT gloomy_JJ procession_NN of_IN persons_NNS carrying_VBG bundles_NNS of_IN rosemary_NN steeped_VBD in_IN blood_NN ._.
Oliver_NNP was_VBD the_DT only_JJ man_NN to_TO deal_VB with_IN such_JJ difficulties_NNS as_IN these_DT ,_, and_CC he_PRP soon_RB cut_VBD them_PRP short_JJ by_IN bursting_VBG at_IN midnight_NN into_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Burford_NNP ,_, near_IN Salisbury_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT mutineers_NNS were_VBD sheltered_JJ ,_, taking_VBG OLIVER_NNP CROMWELL_NNP 373_CD four_CD hundred_CD of_IN them_PRP prisoners_NNS ,_, and_CC shooting_VBG a_DT number_NN of_IN them_PRP by_IN sentence_NN of_IN court_NN -_: martial_NN ._.
The_DT soldiers_NNS soon_RB found_VBN ,_, as_IN all_DT men_NNS did_VBD ,_, that_IN Oliver_NNP was_VBD not_RB a_DT man_NN to_TO be_VB trifled_VBN with_IN ._.
And_CC there_EX was_VBD an_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT mutiny_NN ._.
The_DT Scottish_NNP Parliament_NNP did_VBD not_RB know_VB Oliver_NNP yet_RB ;_: so_RB ,_, on_IN hearing_NN of_IN the_DT Kings_NNPS execution_NN ,_, it_PRP proclaimed_VBD the_DT Prince_NNP of_IN Wales_NNP King_NNP Charles_NNP the_DT Second_NNP ,_, on_IN condition_NN of_IN his_PRP$ respecting_VBG the_DT Solemn_NNP League_NNP and_CC Covenant_NNP ._.
Charles_NNP was_VBD abroad_RB at_IN that_DT time_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB was_VBD Montrose_NNP ,_, from_IN whose_WP$ help_NN he_PRP had_VBD hopes_NNS enough_RB to_TO keep_VB him_PRP holding_VBG on_IN and_CC off_IN with_IN commissioners_NNS from_IN Scotland_NNP ,_, just_RB as_IN his_PRP$ father_NN might_MD have_VB done_VBN ._.
These_DT hopes_NNS were_VBD soon_RB at_IN an_DT end_NN ;_: for_IN ,_, Montrose_NNP ,_, having_VBG raised_VBN a_DT few_JJ hundred_CD exiles_NNS in_IN Germany_NNP ,_, and_CC landed_VBD with_IN them_PRP in_IN Scotland_NNP ,_, found_VBD that_IN the_DT people_NNS there_RB ,_, instead_RB of_IN joining_VBG him_PRP ,_, deserted_VBD the_DT country_NN at_IN his_PRP$ approach_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD soon_RB taken_VBN prisoner_NN and_CC carried_VBD to_TO Edinburgh_NNP ._.
There_EX he_PRP was_VBD received_VBN with_IN every_DT possible_JJ insult_NN ,_, and_CC carried_VBD to_TO prison_NN in_IN a_DT cart_NN ,_, his_PRP$ officers_NNS going_VBG two_CD and_CC two_CD before_IN him_PRP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD sentenced_VBN by_IN the_DT Parliament_NNP to_TO be_VB hanged_VBN on_IN a_DT gallows_NNS thirty_CD feet_NNS high_JJ ,_, to_TO have_VB his_PRP$ head_NN set_VBN on_IN a_DT spike_NN in_IN Edinburgh_NNP ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ limbs_NNS distributed_VBN in_IN other_JJ places_NNS ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT old_JJ barbarous_JJ manner_NN ._.
He_PRP said_VBD he_PRP had_VBD always_RB acted_VBN under_IN the_DT Koyal_JJ orders_NNS ,_, and_CC only_RB wished_VBD he_PRP had_VBD limbs_NNS enough_RB to_TO be_VB distributed_VBN through_IN Christendom_NNP ,_, that_IN it_PRP might_MD be_VB the_DT more_RBR widely_RB known_VBN how_WRB loyal_JJ he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN ._.
He_PRP went_VBD to_TO the_DT scaffold_NN in_IN a_DT bright_JJ and_CC brilliant_JJ dress_NN ,_, and_CC made_VBD a_DT bold_JJ end_NN at_IN thirty_CD -_: eight_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ._.
The_DT breath_NN was_VBD scarcely_RB out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN when_WRB Charles_NNP abandoned_VBD his_PRP$ memory_NN ,_, and_CC denied_VBD that_IN he_PRP had_VBD ever_RB given_VBN him_PRP orders_NNS to_TO rise_VB in_IN his_PRP$ behalf_NN ._.
the_DT family_NN failing_VBG was_VBD strong_JJ in_IN that_DT Charles_NNP then_RB !_.
Oliver_NNP had_VBD been_VBN appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Parliament_NNP to_TO command_VB the_DT army_NN in_IN Ireland_NNP ,_, where_WRB he_PRP took_VBD a_DT terrible_JJ vengeance_NN for_IN the_DT sanguinary_JJ rebellion_NN ,_, and_CC made_VBD tremendous_JJ havoc_NN ,_, particularly_RB in_IN the_DT siege_NN of_IN Drogheda_NNP ,_, where_WRB no_DT quarter_NN was_VBD given_VBN ,_, and_CC where_WRB he_PRP found_VBD at_IN least_JJS a_DT thousand_CD of_IN the_DT inhabi_NN -_: tants_NNS shut_VBD up_RP together_RB in_IN the_DT great_JJ church_NN :_: every_DT one_CD of_IN whom_WP was_VBD killed_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ soldiers_NNS ,_, usually_RB known_VBN as_IN Olivers_NNPS Ironsides_NNPS ._.
There_EX were_VBD numbers_NNS of_IN friars_NNS and_CC priests_NNS among_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC Oliver_NNP gruffly_RB wrote_VBD home_NN in_IN his_PRP$ despatch_NN that_IN these_DT were_VBD ''_'' knocked_VBD on_IN the_DT head_NN ''_'' like_IN the_DT rest_NN ._.
But_CC ,_, Charles_NNP having_VBG got_VBN over_IN to_TO Scotland_NNP where_WRB the_DT men_NNS of_IN the_DT Solemn_NNP League_NNP and_CC Covenant_NNP led_VBD him_PRP a_DT prodigiously_RB dull_JJ life_NN and_CC made_VBD him_PRP very_RB weary_JJ with_IN long_JJ sermons_NNS and_CC 374_CD A_DT CHILD_NN S_NN HISTORY_NN OF_IN ENGLAND_NNP grim_JJ Sundays_NNPS ,_, the_DT Parliament_NNP called_VBD the_DT redoubtable_JJ Oliver_NNP home_NN to_TO knock_VB the_DT Scottish_JJ men_NNS on_IN the_DT head_NN for_IN setting_VBG up_RP that_DT Prince_NNP ._.
Oliver_NNP left_VBD his_PRP$ son_NN -_: in_IN -_: law_NN ,_, Ireton_NNP ,_, as_IN general_JJ in_IN Ireland_NNP in_IN his_PRP$ stead_NN -LRB-_-LRB- he_PRP died_VBD there_EX afterwards_RB -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, and_CC he_PRP imitated_VBD the_DT example_NN of_IN his_PRP$ father_NN -_: in_IN -_: law_NN with_IN such_JJ good_JJ will_NN that_IN he_PRP brought_VBD the_DT country_NN to_TO subjection_NN ,_, and_CC laid_VBD it_PRP at_IN the_DT feet_NNS of_IN the_DT Parliament_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT end_NN ,_, they_PRP passed_VBD an_DT act_NN for_IN the_DT settlement_NN of_IN Ireland_NNP ,_, generally_RB pardoning_VBG all_PDT the_DT common_JJ people_NNS ,_, but_CC exempting_VBG from_IN this_DT grace_NN such_JJ of_IN the_DT wealthier_JJR sort_NN as_IN had_VBD been_VBN concerned_VBN in_IN the_DT rebellion_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN any_DT killing_NN of_IN Protestants_NNPS ,_, or_CC who_WP refused_VBD to_TO lay_VB down_RP their_PRP$ arms_NNS ._.
Great_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN Irish_JJ were_VBD got_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT country_NN to_TO serve_VB under_IN Catholic_NNP powers_NNS abroad_RB ,_, and_CC a_DT quantity_NN of_IN land_NN was_VBD declared_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN forfeited_VBN by_IN past_JJ offences_NNS ,_, and_CC was_VBD given_VBN to_TO people_NNS who_WP had_VBD lent_VBN money_NN to_TO the_DT Parliament_NNP early_RB in_IN the_DT war_NN ._.
These_DT were_VBD sweeping_JJ measures_NNS ;_: but_CC ,_, if_IN Oliver_NNP Cromwell_NNP had_VBD had_VBN his_PRP$ own_JJ way_NN fully_RB ,_, and_CC had_VBD stayed_VBN in_IN Ireland_NNP ,_, he_PRP would_MD have_VB done_VBN more_RBR yet_RB ._.

Now_RB ,_, the_DT Scottish_JJ men_NNS ,_, being_VBG then_RB --_: as_IN you_PRP will_MD generally_RB find_VB them_PRP now_RB --_: mighty_JJ cautious_JJ ,_, reflected_VBD that_IN the_DT troops_NNS they_PRP had_VBD ,_, were_VBD not_RB used_VBN to_TO war_NN like_IN the_DT Ironsides_NNPS ,_, and_CC would_MD be_VB beaten_VBN in_IN an_DT open_JJ fight_NN ._.

''_''
This_DT was_VBD ,_, no_DT doubt_NN ,_, the_DT wisest_JJS plan_NN ;_: but_CC as_IN the_DT Scottish_JJ clergy_NNS would_MD interfere_VB with_IN what_WP they_PRP knew_VBD nothing_NN about_RB ,_, and_CC Avould_NNP perpetually_RB preach_VBP long_JJ sermons_NNS exhorting_VBG the_DT soldiers_NNS to_TO come_VB out_RP and_CC fight_NN ,_, the_DT soldiers_NNS got_VBD it_PRP in_IN their_PRP$ heads_NNS that_IN they_PRP absolutely_RB must_MD come_VB out_RP and_CC fight_NN ._.
Accordingly_RB ,_, in_IN an_DT evil_JJ hour_NN for_IN themselves_PRP ,_, they_PRP came_VBD out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ safe_JJ position_NN ._.
Oliver_NNP fell_VBD upon_IN them_PRP instantly_RB ,_, and_CC killed_VBD three_CD thousand_CD ,_, and_CC took_VBD ten_CD thousand_CD prisoners_NNS ._.

He_PRP was_VBD over_IN -_: taken_VBN and_CC induced_VBN to_TO return_VB ;_: but_CC this_DT attempt_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD called_VBN ''_'' The_DT Start_NNP ,_, ''_'' did_VBD him_PRP just_RB so_RB much_JJ service_NN ,_, that_IN they_PRP did_VBD not_RB preach_VB quite_RB such_JJ long_JJ sermons_NNS at_IN him_PRP afterwards_RB as_IN they_PRP had_VBD done_VBN before_RB ._.
On_IN the_DT first_JJ of_IN January_NNP ,_, one_CD thousand_CD six_CD hundred_CD and_CC fifty_CD -_: one_CD ,_, the_DT Scottish_JJ people_NNS crowned_VBD him_PRP at_IN Scone_NNP ._.
He_PRP immediately_RB took_VBD the_DT chief_JJ command_NN of_IN an_DT army_NN of_IN twenty_CD thousand_CD men_NNS ,_, and_CC marched_VBD to_TO Stirling_NNP ._.
His_PRP$ hopes_NNS were_VBD heightened_VBN ,_, I_PRP dare_VBP say_VB ,_, by_IN the_DT redoubtable_JJ Oliver_NNP being_VBG ill_RB of_IN an_DT ague_NN ;_: but_CC Oliver_NNP scrambled_VBD out_RB of_IN bed_NN in_IN no_DT time_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD to_TO work_VB with_IN such_JJ energy_NN that_IN he_PRP got_VBD behind_IN the_DT Koyalist_NNP army_NN and_CC cut_VB it_PRP off_RP from_IN all_DT communication_NN with_IN Scotland_NNP ._.
There_EX was_VBD nothing_NN for_IN it_PRP then_RB ,_, but_CC to_TO go_VB on_IN to_TO England_NNP ;_: so_IN it_PRP went_VBD on_IN as_RB far_RB as_IN Worcester_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT mayor_NN and_CC some_DT of_IN the_DT gentry_NN proclaimed_VBD King_NNP Charles_NNP the_DT Second_JJ straightway_NN ._.
His_PRP$ proclamation_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD of_IN little_JJ use_NN to_TO him_PRP ,_, for_IN very_RB few_JJ Royalists_NNS appeared_VBD ;_: and_CC ,_, on_IN the_DT very_RB same_JJ day_NN ,_, two_CD people_NNS were_VBD publicly_RB beheaded_VBN on_IN Tower_NNP Hill_NNP for_IN espousing_VBG his_PRP$ cause_NN ._.

The_DT escape_NN of_IN Charles_NNP after_IN this_DT battle_NN of_IN Worcester_NNP did_VBD him_PRP good_JJ service_NN long_RB afterwards_RB ,_, for_IN it_PRP induced_VBD many_JJ of_IN the_DT generous_JJ English_JJ people_NNS to_TO take_VB a_DT romantic_JJ interest_NN in_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC to_TO think_VB much_RB better_JJR of_IN him_PRP than_IN he_PRP ever_RB deserved_VBD ._.
He_PRP fled_VBD in_IN the_DT night_NN ,_, with_IN not_RB more_JJR than_IN sixty_CD followers_NNS ,_, to_TO the_DT house_NN of_IN a_DT Catholic_JJ lady_NN in_IN Staffordshire_NNP ._.
There_RB ,_, for_IN his_PRP$ greater_JJR safety_NN ,_, the_DT whole_JJ sixty_CD left_VBD him_PRP ._.

On_IN the_DT night_NN of_IN the_DT fifteenth_NN of_IN October_NNP ,_, accom_NNP -_: panied_VBN by_IN two_CD colonels_NNS and_CC a_DT merchant_NN ,_, the_DT King_NNP rode_VBD to_TO Brighton_NNP ,_, then_RB a_DT little_JJ fishing_NN village_NN ,_, to_TO give_VB the_DT captain_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN a_DT supper_NN before_IN going_VBG on_IN board_NN ;_: but_CC ,_, so_RB many_JJ people_NNS knew_VBD him_PRP ,_, that_IN this_DT captain_NN knew_VBD him_PRP too_RB ,_, and_CC not_RB only_RB he_PRP ,_, but_CC the_DT landlord_NN and_CC landlady_NN also_RB ._.
Before_IN he_PRP went_VBD away_RB ,_, the_DT landlord_NN came_VBD behind_IN his_PRP$ chair_NN ,_, kissed_VBD his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD he_PRP hoped_VBD to_TO live_VB to_TO be_VB a_DT lord_NN and_CC to_TO see_VB his_PRP$ wife_NN a_DT lady_NN ;_: at_IN which_WDT Charles_NNP laughed_VBD ._.

Nor_CC were_VBD they_PRP ._.
The_DT English_NNP broadsides_NNS so_RB exceedingly_RB astonished_VBD the_DT Dutch_NNP that_IN they_PRP sheered_VBD off_RP at_IN last_JJ ,_, though_IN the_DT redoubtable_JJ Van_NNP Tromp_NNP fired_VBD upon_IN them_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ guns_NNS for_IN deserting_VBG their_PRP$ flag_NN ._.

Oliver_NNP ,_, indignant_JJ with_IN the_DT two_CD commanders_NNS who_WP had_VBD not_RB done_VBN what_WP bold_JJ Admiral_NN Blake_NNP would_MD have_VB done_VBN ,_, clapped_VBD them_PRP both_DT into_IN prison_NN ,_, declared_VBD war_NN against_IN Spain_NNP ,_, and_CC made_VBD a_DT treaty_NN with_IN France_NNP ,_, in_IN virtue_NN of_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD to_TO shelter_NN the_DT King_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ brother_NN the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN York_NNP no_RB longer_RB ._.

Blake_NNP cared_VBD no_DT more_RBR for_IN great_JJ guns_NNS than_IN for_IN pop_NN -_: guns_NNS --_: no_RB more_RBR for_IN their_PRP$ hot_JJ iron_NN balls_NNS than_IN for_IN snow_NN -_: balls_NNS ._.
He_PRP dashed_VBD into_IN the_DT harbour_NN ,_, captured_VBN and_CC burnt_JJ every_DT one_CD of_IN the_DT ships_NNS ,_, and_CC came_VBD sailing_VBG out_RP again_RB triumphantly_RB ,_, with_IN the_DT victorious_JJ English_JJ flag_NN flying_VBG at_IN his_PRP$ masthead_NN ._.
